jogos.description: It_s ten years since the infection started. Long-established settlements are collapsing, one by one, for unknown reasons. Survivors are running to the hills to escape, hoping for safety in remote places. As another refugee, you're here to carve out a new life for yourself - by any means necessary.

jogos.title: Brothers in Arms: Earned in Blood™
jogos.description: With its unprecedented combination of authenticity, compelling story and squad-based action, the Brothers in Arms franchise has established itself as a benchmark for military action games, receiving the highest average review scores of any console WWII game to date (www.gamerankings.com).

jogos.title: The Haunted: Hells Reach
jogos.description: Winner of 2010′s Make Something Unreal contest, The Haunted: Hells Reach is a fast-paced horror game where your goal is to liberate cursed places and survive the assault of Hell.

jogos.title: MONSTER HUNTER RISE - Peça de armadura em camadas de caçador "Zori Florido"
Blue Estate The Game
jogos.description: O Blue Estate é um rail-shooter ao humor negro e corrosivo, adaptado do romance gráfico nomeado para os Eisner Awards : Blue Estate de Viktor Kalvachev!

jogos.title: Rising Constellation
jogos.description: Cooperation is key in this team-based 4X multiplayer grand strategy game set in a futuristic universe. Become instrumental in your faction’s pursuit of galactic domination through resource management, strategic gameplay and interactive roleplay.

jogos.title: Yet Another Zombie Defense HD
jogos.description: Yet Another Zombie Defense HD é um jogo de tiro isométrico de zumbis com elementos de defesa de torres, incluindo modos cooperativo online e local com participação de até 4 jogadores. Construa sua base durante o dia e a defenda durante a noite, teste suas habilidades e sobreviva o quanto puder!

jogos.title: First Class Escape: The Train of Thought
jogos.description: "First Class Escape: The Train of Thought" is a co-operative atmospheric escape room puzzle game, set in a beautifully realized vintage train. Do you think you have what it takes to solve the puzzles and escape the train?

jogos.title: Beyond Contact
jogos.description: A fiercely formidable sci-fi survival game, set on a hostile alien world that wants you dead! Alone, or with a crew, do you have what it takes to survive?

jogos.title: Outland
jogos.description: Outland is a fast-paced, dynamic platformer where the player uses powers of light and dark in an epic journey to save the world from forces of chaos.

jogos.title: Obliteracers
jogos.description: Award-winning same-screen party racing for up to 16 players! Race brutal-cute aliens on exotic planets, using weapon powerups and physics-based vehicles to annihilate your competition in frantic round-based combat. Connect spare gamepads, laptops and smart devices as extra controllers.

jogos.title: Joggernauts
jogos.description: Jog! Jump! Switch! Coordinate the crazy conga line of alien athletes in this autorunner / puzzle platformer for 1-4 players.

jogos.title: Knight Squad 2
jogos.description: Knight Squad 2 é um jogo multijogador caótico para até 8 jogadores. Escolha um cavaleiro esquisito e lute em busca da glória com armas malucas. Triunfe sobre seus amigos em uma incrível variedade de modos, off-line e on-line.

jogos.title: Over 9000 Zombies!
jogos.description: Over 9000 Zombies! é ação em estilo arcade com perspectiva de cima e um ritmo frenético sem precedentes. Uma horda infinita de zumbis está vindo atrás de você. Quanto tempo você será capaz de sobreviver?

jogos.title: Wasteland Survival
jogos.description: Survive the post apocalypse in Wasteland Survival - the last shelter for survivors on earth! The first thing you need learn is survival. Build home. Craft & Upgrade weapons to kill hordes of zombies, Hunt & Explore with your dog. Gather resources and PVP Plunder... Can you stop the zombie apocalypse?

jogos.title: Desperados 2: Cooper_s Revenge
jogos.description: Desperados 2 is the sequel to the successful wild west title Desperados - Wanted Dead or Alive. The gameplay is based on its predecessor but with brand new tactical possibilities in a beautiful 3D environment. Switch from an isometric view to a third person view whenever you want; for example, for duels, brawls and shoot-outs.

jogos.title: Worbital
jogos.description: With the shifting gravity on your side, aim your cannons, blast your enemies and enjoy the fireworks. Worbital is a real-time strategic artillery game in space, peppered with a heavy dose of cosmic chaos. The goal: be the last civilization standing!
tags: Estratégia em Tempo Real com Ação

jogos.title: Never Return
jogos.description: "Never Return" is a 3D action adventure game with roguelike elements. There are various weapon types to choose from. Each Type has its own play style. With thousands of creative prefixes and a huge amount of skills, every player can easily create their own build.

jogos.title: Shatter
jogos.description: Shatter is a retro-inspired brick-breaking game that merges familiar action with unique twists and a modern crafted production approach.

jogos.title: MONSTER HUNTER RISE - Traje de Corumocho "Pequeno Dracoalado"
Trickster VR: Co-op Dungeon Crawler
jogos.description: A procedurally generated fantasy adventure, starring floating islands, epic loot and a horde of orcs! Try your skills against orcish combat expertise, ancient magic and ragtag airships!

jogos.title: Emily Wants To Play
jogos.description: Emily Quer Jogar é um assustador jogo de terror e sobrevivência, com elementos de estratégia. O jogador é um entregador de pizza que fica preso por Emily e as suas três bonecas. As bonecas estão vivas e correm pela casa consigo.

jogos.title: Bad Rats: the Rats' Revenge
jogos.description: Bad Rats is a physics puzzle game where rats finally get their bloody revenge on their new prisoners: The cats. Come up with creative solutions for each puzzle using physics, functional objects, and your specially trained Rats. Try different ways of solving each puzzle to finish faster or earn higher scores.

jogos.title: Damned
jogos.description: Damned: A Randomized Online Horror Game - What is Damned? Damned is a randomized online horror game for up to 5 players (4 survivors and 1 monster). You’ll be able to play as one of four people trapped in different haunted places (hotels, hospitals, etc).

jogos.title: Tour de France 2020
jogos.description: Enfrente o pelotão nas 21 etapas do Tour de France no jogo oficial! Para conquistar a camisa amarela você terá que correr riscos, atacar, dar sprints e aperfeiçoar suas táticas de corrida. Desafie seus amigos nos modos Downhill ou Sprint Challenge!

jogos.title: Escape First 3
jogos.description: "Escape First 3" is the third installment of a multiplayer escape room puzzle game for virtual reality or desktop PC! It includes 3 different escape rooms to choose from and can be played competitively, co-op or solo.

jogos.title: Never Return
jogos.description: "Never Return" is a 3D action adventure game with roguelike elements. There are various weapon types to choose from. Each Type has its own play style. With thousands of creative prefixes and a huge amount of skills, every player can easily create their own build.

jogos.title: GONNER2
jogos.description: Nesta sequência de GoNNER, percorra lugares escuros e caóticos com cores inimagináveis enquanto ajuda a Morte a eliminar uma presença misteriosa no seu próprio covil. Enfrente chefões loucos e perca (muito) a cabeça neste jogo de plataforma bagunçado, fofo e acelerado, todo gerado proceduralmente.

jogos.title: En Route: Space
jogos.description: En Route: Space is a 2 player co-op puzzle game where you need each other to figure your way out through the mysteries of space. Work together, open your mind and trust one another to persevere this adventure.

jogos.title: Painkiller Hell & Damnation
jogos.description: Evil has returned! Demonic powers are manifesting themselves as a myriad of dark creatures, fighting over the fates of imprisoned souls caught in Purgatory.

jogos.title: Dungeon Siege
jogos.description: Dungeon Siege® combina os elementos mais importantes de um RPG com ação intensa. Dungeon Siege mergulha-o em um mundo de fantasia 3D colocando-o frente a frente com um exército dedicado a mergulhar o mundo no caos.

jogos.title: Unfortunate Spacemen
jogos.description: Unfortunate Spacemen is a multiplayer game about Shape-shifting deception and betrayal! As a hapless yet brave spaceman employed by "The Company" you'll work diligently to defend and be rescued from failing outposts, but not everyone around you is who they claim to be...

jogos.title: Pixel Galaxy
jogos.description: A non-shooting shoot 'em up where you must grow, make friends, and survive together.

jogos.title: BADLAND: Game of the Year Edition
jogos.description: Voe e sobreviva no mundo de BADLAND, eleito Jogo do Ano, e descubra uma quantidade assombrosa de armadilhas, enigmas e obstáculos surpreendentes pelo caminho.

jogos.title: Get Together: A Coop Adventure
jogos.description: Dois seres perdidos e você é o único elo entre eles... Jogue com um amigo para guiá-los e reuni-los em sua jornada, nesta aventura cooperativa com base na comunicação. Você joga em dois dispositivos sem nenhuma conexão, exceto sua voz.

jogos.title: QuiVr
jogos.description: QuiVr is the defining archery experience, made from the ground up for Virtual Reality. Grab your bow, arrows, and some friends to fight the enemy onslaught.

jogos.title: Disney Epic Mickey 2:  The Power of Two
jogos.description: Unleash the power of the brush in an all new co-op adventure. Join Mickey and Oswald in an epic battle to save the magical world of Wasteland and change it forever. Interact with your favorite characters like never before in the most heroic adventure yet.

jogos.title: Streets of Red : Devil_s Dare Deluxe
jogos.description: Damos as boas-vindas a Streets of Red: Devil_s Dare Deluxe, o multijogador de horror com lutas e morte permanente que dá aos jogadores habilidades dos heróis retrô contra uma legião de monstruosidades mortas-vivas.

jogos.title: Operation Armstrong
jogos.description: Your infiltration team must stop an army of lunar-bots from crashing the moon into our Earth! The field operative, wielding the VR headset, must sneak through each enemy outpost while their team of hackers will assist using their smartphones! Strap in for some Asymmetric-VR-Stealth-Party gameplay!

jogos.title: RoboSkate
jogos.description: Roll the board. Whir the motors. Scrape the metal. RoboSkate is a short and challenging physics based adventure where you master the controls of a robotic arm stuck to a skateboard and overcome the trials of a short yet treacherous journey.

jogos.title: DARIUSBURST Chronicle Saviours
jogos.description: A mais recente edição da série DARIUS de jogos de tiro de estilo arcade. Faça tempura de monstros alienígenas do oceano, marcando o seu caminho através de centenas de ambientes.

jogos.title: Paw Paw Paw
jogos.description: Paw Paw Paw era um reino pacífico e próspero. Até um dia, quando o Rei decidiu obrigar todos a usar calças. Somos a resistência. Somos os Anticalças.

jogos.title: Prison Life
jogos.description: An online game that you'll play with 3-11 players as a Prisoner or a Guard and will try to escape or prevent escapes. Loot, Craft, and make your way to the exit, or investigate and arrest wanted players as a guard!

jogos.title: Bulletstorm: Full Clip Edition
jogos.description: Coloque-se no lugar de Grayson Hunt depois que uma colisão o obriga a aterrissar em um antigo planeta resort e a fazer uma escolha: sobreviver ou se vingar.

jogos.title: Out of Reach
jogos.description: Você é um náufrago preso no meio do nada. A tempestade passou, mas o pior ainda não. Procure comida e recursos, crie itens, monte um abrigo. Isso é o básico, é preciso muito mais para permanecer vivo nesta ilha isolada, mas não deserta. Construa e queime, navegue e explore, fique fora do alcance!

jogos.title: ORION: Prelude
jogos.description: Work together to survive the devastating Dinosaur horde in huge, endless environments.

jogos.title: Potion Party
jogos.description: Potion Party is a funny couch co-op alchemy game for one to four players. Working as a team, you and your friends must manage your own alchemy shop. Earn money, upgrade your tools, decorate the shop and become a master alchemist!

jogos.title: The Walking Zombie: Dead City
jogos.description: The Walking Zombie: Dead City é um jogo de tiro em primeira pessoa com um modo de cooperação on-line em um mundo cheio de zumbis para matar. Compre e aprimore suas armas, mate todos inimigos em 200 níveis e destrua poderosos monstros chefes antes que eles te comam vivo!

jogos.title: Clandestine
jogos.description: Clandestine is a 2-player or singleplayer stealth/hacking game set in 1996. Asymmetrical co-op allows one player to take the role of the spy while a friend provides overwatch and assistance as the hacker, and unravel a post-Cold War espionage conspiracy.

jogos.title: AirMech Wastelands
jogos.description: AirMech Wastelands is an Action-RPG set in an alternate future America following a global collapse of modern civilization. You are an AirMech Pilot, with the skills to fly and upgrade these ultimate pre-war machines.

jogos.title: Shotgun Legend
jogos.description: Eugene must battle aliens and the undead in search of a truck rim, as it seems to be his ticket home.

jogos.title: Monster Hunter Rise - Voz de caçador: Humor Instável
Homeworld: Deserts of Kharak
jogos.description: A ground-based RTS prequel to the classic Homeworld games. Assemble your fleet and lead them to victory on the shifting sands of Kharak in this compelling strategy game for PC from Blackbird Interactive.

jogos.title: Screencheat
jogos.description: Screencheat é o ridículo jogo de tiro com tela dividida onde todo mundo é visíveil, então você tem que fazer "screencheat" (Screencheat - substantivo: ato de olhar na tela do seu oponente. "Pare de fazer screencheat, seu trapaceiro!").

jogos.title: Alpaca Ball: Allstars
jogos.description: Football with Alpacas! Bring the cup home in this hilarious and chaotic physics-based party game. Play with up to 8 players in versus mode, or tackle the career mode either solo or in 2 player co-op! Peru-ve yourself on the Picchu and win those Machus!

jogos.title: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing: Final Cut
jogos.description: Embark on an adventure in a gothic-noir world, where mad science threatens the peace between monsters and mortals. The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing: Final Cut is definitive edition of the trilogy with six playable classes and a new endgame mode with a huge variety of open missions!

jogos.title: Toy Soldiers: Complete
jogos.description: Command your Toy Soldiers in multiplayer or co-op with Toy Soldiers: Complete! Bring your toys to life in this action-packed, strategy-based game bundle with the original Toy Soldiers, Toy Soldiers: Cold War, and its DLC’S – Kaiser’s Battle, Invasion, Napalm and Evil Empire.

jogos.title: Earthfall
jogos.description: JÁ DISPONÍVEL! Earthfall é um jogo de tiro cooperativo para até quatro jogadores. Usando táticas de equipe para fortalecer defesas e completar objetivos, os jogadores devem trabalhar em conjunto para sobreviver.

jogos.title: Super Soccer Blast
jogos.description: Começa o jogo! O Super Soccer Blast é um jogo de futebol estilo arcade. Entre em campo para melhorar seus movimentos jogo após jogo e derrote seus adversários e se tornar o melhor.

jogos.title: 8-Bit Invaders!
jogos.description: 8-Bit Invaders! é um jogo rápido de estratégia em tempo real, no estilo retrô, para PC. Controle o poderio militar dos Fuzileiros Galácticos ou execute invasões com a força devastadora dos Cranioides! Minere, construa e guerreie até vencer! Nunca foi tão fácil conquistar o Multiverso.

jogos.title: PIGGY: Hunt
jogos.description: PIGGY: Hunt is a fast-paced survival horror multiplayer game. Survivors must work together to survive and escape from the Infected.

jogos.title: Wand Wars
jogos.description: Ride brooms, cast spells and transform your enemies into chickens in this intense magical sport

jogos.title: Distrust: Polar Survival
jogos.description: DISTRUST is an isometric survival adventure with procedural generation on an Arctic research station lost in the endless dark of a polar night. A story-rich fiction with multiple endings that suits both singleplayer fans and co-op enthusiasts.

jogos.title: Jack Axe
jogos.description: Seja Jack! Pegue um machado! Leve Jack (e suas irmãs) em uma aventura de plataforma, jogando sozinho ou com amigos, em um mundo aberto e vibrante inspirado na mitologia filipina e nórdica.

jogos.title: God Mode
jogos.description: Você gosta de correr? E de atirar? E se colocarmos habilidades especiais junto? Armas melhoráveis? Digamos que haja dezenas de inimigos na tela para destruir e, como recompensa por despachá-los, você ganhe experiência e ouro, que podem ser usados para personalizar o seu personagem e compra de novos equipamentos – tudo isso com mais...

jogos.title: ULTIMATE HARDBASS DEFENCE
jogos.description: SHOOT. SURVIVE. DANCE HARDBASS.

jogos.title: Fight The Dragon
jogos.description: A COMMUNITY CREATED Hack'n Slash RPG where players can team up and tackle exciting adventures made by other community members in our in-game Adventure Construction Kit - It_s DIABLO meets LITTLE BIG PLANET!

jogos.title: Spacebase Startopia
jogos.description: SPACEBASE STARTOPIA cativa com sua mistura original de simulação econômica, estratégia de construção de império, batalhas de RTS clássico e uma boa dose de humor.

jogos.title: Trivia Tricks
jogos.description: Trivia Tricks is a party game featuring 8 player online and 4 locally! Play competitively against your friends or team up to take on trivia bosses in Co-Op! Use your smartphone with Remote Play! Flex your brain muscle in a huge range of categories in Steam’s definitive trivia showdown!

jogos.title: Interstellar Marines
jogos.description: UPDATE 28 AVAILABLE - Interstellar Marines is an immersive tactical sci-fi First Person Simulator in the making, offering a unique blend of tactical gameplay, dynamic environments and non-scripted AI. Play Singleplayer or Co-op/PvP on servers around the world.

jogos.title: Grand Mountain Adventure: Wonderlands
jogos.description: An open-world skiing and snowboarding adventure!

jogos.title: FORCED: Slightly Better Edition
jogos.description: FORCED is a challenging 1-4-player game with co-op at its heart! A mix of tactical arcade action, RPG elements and puzzles will forge you and your friends together. As slaves in the toughest gladiator school of them all, you will face a plethora of unique trials - designed to be your death!

jogos.title: DG2: Defense Grid 2
jogos.description: Defense Grid 2 é o próximo estágio na evolução dos jogos de defesa das torres. No Defense Grid 2, os jogadores descobrirão novidades que exigirão uma mudança em sua estratégia. Há milhares de maneiras diferentes de se vencer um nível, portanto sua solução será de fato só sua.

jogos.title: Mansions of Madness
jogos.description: A companion app for the Mansions of Madness Second Edition board game from Fantasy Flight Games. Mansions of Madness is a cooperative game of mystery and investigation inspired by the writings of H. P. Lovecraft. During each game, one to five players explore a location to unravel a mystery.

jogos.title: 山河伏妖录
jogos.description: 联机修仙，多人爬塔！《山河伏妖录》是一款重现上古神话的多人联机策略冒险游戏，你受命于乱世，修习奇门功法，斩尽魑魅魍魉，还天下以太平。

jogos.title: Flat Heroes
jogos.description: Pule, desvie, se apresse e ataque para se abrir passo diante centenas de inimigos minimalistas. Intenso demais? Convide seus amigos e juntem suas forças!

jogos.title: School of Dragons
jogos.description: Fly fast, train hard, and learn well to become the Ultimate Dragon Trainer! Join Chief Hiccup and Toothless and embark on the thrilling adventures of DreamWorks Animation’s ‘How to Train Your Dragon’. Play with your friends and explore mysterious worlds in this action-packed learning experience!

jogos.title: Deathtrap
jogos.description: Deathtrap is a Tower Defense game with strong action-RPG elements, a game of vicious tricks, killing machines, rotating blades and splattering blood.

jogos.title: FurryFury: Smash & Roll
jogos.description: A dynamic beast-rolling turn-based online arena puzzle brawler on physics.

jogos.title: The Dishwasher: Vampire Smile
jogos.description: Para jogar este jogo, você deve desativar o controle de conteúdo pelos pais. Restam três marcas! Desbloqueia The Dishwasher: Vampire Smile e segue Yuki no seu percurso sangrento em busca da vingança.

jogos.title: Puzzle With Your Friends
jogos.description: In Puzzle With Your Friends you can puzzle alone, with and also against your friends via the internet! Unique motives from different games and artists are available.

jogos.title: Shank 2
jogos.description: The fan-favorite 2D brawler is back as ex-mob hit man Shank returns to action in Shank 2. With those closest to him under attack, Shank is once again forced on the offensive. Now he must put his trusty arsenal of handguns, shotguns, automatic weapons, chainsaws, machetes, grenades, plus all-new weaponry and moves to use in order to...

jogos.title: MONSTER HUNTER RISE - Voz de caçador: Minoto
Kinduo
jogos.description: Kinduo é um jogo cooperativo local onde dois amigos elementais superam obstáculos para retornar à sua ilha, empurre caixas, use eletricidade para conectar objetos, quebre blocos de gelo, exploda coisas e muito mais neste jogo cooperativo fofo e colorido!

jogos.title: DG2: Defense Grid 2
jogos.description: Defense Grid 2 é o próximo estágio na evolução dos jogos de defesa das torres. No Defense Grid 2, os jogadores descobrirão novidades que exigirão uma mudança em sua estratégia. Há milhares de maneiras diferentes de se vencer um nível, portanto sua solução será de fato só sua.

jogos.title: Travis Strikes Again: No More Heroes Complete Edition
jogos.description: Travis Strikes Again, Beam Katana carregada! Ele foi sugado para dentro do console lendário Death Drive Mk II, onde qualquer um que colecionar todas as Death Balls tem seus desejos atendidos (…será?).

jogos.title: Mansions of Madness
jogos.description: A companion app for the Mansions of Madness Second Edition board game from Fantasy Flight Games. Mansions of Madness is a cooperative game of mystery and investigation inspired by the writings of H. P. Lovecraft. During each game, one to five players explore a location to unravel a mystery.

jogos.title: WolfQuest: Classic
jogos.description: LIVE THE LIFE OF A WILD WOLF! As a two-year-old gray wolf in Yellowstone National Park, hunt elk and moose, find a mate, and then establish a territory and raise your pups.

jogos.title: Deadly Broadcast
jogos.description: Deadly Broadcast is a co-op horror and survival game that can be played with 1-4 people. Destroy the hearts that give life to patients turned half-human, half-devil by a scientist before they kill you. Survive and keep streaming no matter what!

jogos.title: Survivalist
jogos.description: It_s one year after the collapse of civilization and self-centered hedge fund manager Joe Wheeler emerges from his specially constructed bunker in search of food. This is a huge open-world RPG where you have the freedom to play how you want - but your choices have consequences.

jogos.title: Natural Selection 2
jogos.description: A fast paced multiplayer shooter that pits aliens against humans in a strategic and action-packed struggle for survival!

jogos.title: Ninja Kiwi Archive
jogos.description: Enjoy some of the best loved Flash games of the past in this awesome time capsule of over 60 Ninja Kiwi classics. Experience a piece of history and play the original Flash games that spawned the worldwide phenomenon of Bloons TD.

jogos.title: Trivia Tricks
jogos.description: Trivia Tricks is a party game featuring 8 player online and 4 locally! Play competitively against your friends or team up to take on trivia bosses in Co-Op! Use your smartphone with Remote Play! Flex your brain muscle in a huge range of categories in Steam’s definitive trivia showdown!

jogos.title: Mark & Lara: Partners In Justice
jogos.description: Call your partner and become the best detective duo in this CO-OP adventure! Gather evidence, question the suspects and point out their contradictions. Cooperation is key as neither of you have the full picture of the case! Play on two devices, local or remotely, all you need is a voice connection.

jogos.title: Fireboy & Watergirl: Fairy Tales
jogos.description: Fireboy & Watergirl are back! This time with fairies to help you!

jogos.title: Village of Zombies
jogos.description: Em Village of Zombies você pode lutar contra zumbis e mutantes junto com outros jogadores ou sozinho em mapas diferentes, o objetivo é sobreviver ao maior número de níveis possível. O jogo começa sempre no nível 1 e a cada aumento de nível, vêm mais zumbis e zumbis mais fortes.

jogos.title: Call of Coronga
jogos.description: Já pensou em enfrentar junto com seus amigos hordas de pessoas gripadas? "Call of Coronga" é Perfeito para você. No jogo você recebe a nobre missão de salvar o mundo do novo "corona vírus" mortal criado em laboratório. Esta preparado para isso ?

jogos.title: Outside The Grid
jogos.description: Imagine that you are in prison. Not everyone can escape from the hands of justice, you need to have an IQ above average. Blow up, destroy, hide, kill, evolve - all this can be done in the game Outside the Grid. But do not forget about Kerbalai, help him finally find peace!

jogos.title: Gatling Gears
jogos.description: When the Empire begins its reign of destruction in a thirst for natural resources, it’s up to Max Brawley, a retired Gatling Gear pilot, to stop them.

jogos.title: Never Alone (Kisima Ingitchuna)
jogos.description: Criado em parceria com os nativos do Alasca, Never Alone (Kisima Ingitchuna) mergulha nos saberes tradicionais do povo Inupiat, do Ártico, para uma experiência de jogo única. Never Alone é um jogo com desafios atmosféricos para 1 ou 2 jogadores.

jogos.title: Might & Magic: Clash of Heroes
jogos.description: Scattered across five different regions, five special heroes must travel their own dangerous paths to grow in strength, unravel a demonic plot & ultimately save the world from chaos.

jogos.title: Laser League: World Arena
jogos.description: Uma experiência multijogador inédita - fácil de começar, praticamente impossível parar de jogar, o Laser League começa como um simples teste de reflexos, mas logo se torna um combate estratégico, com complexas táticas de equipe. Agora é grátis para entrar.

jogos.title: Tom Clancy_s Ghost Recon®
jogos.description: Europa Oriental, 2008. A guerra começou nas fronteiras da Rússia e o destino do mundo pesa na balança. É quando a chamada é feita para os Ghosts, uma elite de poucos especialmente treinados Boinas Verdes, armados com a última tecnologia e treinados para usar as armas mais mortíferas.

jogos.title: Incident Commander
jogos.description: Sudden disaster has put the town at risk, and you are the Incident Commander! It is up to you to control the responder teams who can stop the growing threat and save the community. The mayor is watching. Can you keep the public safe and stay within budget?

jogos.title: 8-Bit Armies
jogos.description: 8-Bit Armies é um jogo retrô de estratégia em tempo real. Com seu estilo colorido e cúbico, 8-Bit Armies é o RTS mais frenético e acessível já feito pela Petroglyph. Apresenta uma campanha com 25 missões solo, 12 missões cooperativas, e modos multijogador e combate.

jogos.title: Paper Pirates
jogos.description: Grab a crew and jump aboard a haunted pirate ship for a social deduction party game, using your phones as controllers! Are you a human sailing home to shore or a ghost working against the crew? Throw your crewmates overboard, but fear not - nobody’s ever out of the game!

jogos.title: Digger Online
jogos.description: Sanbox multiplayer building game with additional game mods

jogos.title: Golazo! Soccer League
jogos.description: Golazo is a dynamic arcade football game with a medium-sized fields, no fouls and offsides whistled. Just pure fun!

jogos.title: Tanuki Justice
jogos.description: Tanuki Justice is an action-packed run 'n gun (but with shurikens) platformer. Take on the role of a cute yet ruthless raccoon and take out various foes charging you from every angle. Play alone or, for double the fun, invite a friend, for there are many challenges to overcome together!

jogos.title: Hunter_s Arena: Legends
jogos.description: Prove o seu valor como o caçador mais poderoso ao sobreviver às provações e aos perigos deste mundo. Conquiste a arena e seja o último caçador em pé após a batalha.

jogos.title: Iron Brigade
jogos.description: Join The Mobile Trench Brigade and protect humanity from the evil Monovision menace!

jogos.title: Modern Combat Versus
jogos.description: Entre com tudo nesse FPS multiplayer cheio de diversão e ação acelerada. Escolha seu Agente, domine sua função e o campo de batalha com sua equipe. De hábeis atacantes a defensores e assassinos dissimulados, há um Agente para cada estilo de jogo.

jogos.title: Dungeon Siege II
jogos.description: It’s been a generation since you vanquished the evil that plagued the Land of Ehb, and now…a new menace has awakened. In Dungeon Siege II, the sequel to the best-selling RPG from Gas Powered Games, you will be called on to again wield sword and spell to save the world from a growing abomination many years in the making.

jogos.title: Killer Queen Black
jogos.description: An epic, platform strategy game for up to eight players online or locally. Play Killer Queen Black casually in quickplay matches, up the intensity in ranked matches, or invite friends to a private room. Easy to play, hard to master, fun for all!
jogos.developers: Liquid Bit, LLC; BumbleBear Games, LLC;

jogos.title: Super Volley Blast
jogos.description: Estás pronto para uma loucura e te tornares o melhor jogador de vólei do mundo? Super Volley Blast é um soberbo jogo de vólei de praia que proporciona muita diversão a ti e aos teus amigos.

jogos.title: Super Nano Blaster
jogos.description: Super Nano Blaster is a shoot-em-up for PC and Mac, offering single-player and local co-op modes, that transports you to a retro-style digital universe. Delve into technology with your vessel and destroy anything that gets in your way!

jogos.title: Crimsonland
jogos.description: Thousands of aliens, giant spiders, mutant lizards, and more are on the attack - can you survive the onslaught? Crimsonland is a top-down shooter with a touch of RPG. Unlock over 30 weapons and over 50 perks from quirky to brutal. Complete the quest and show your skills in five survival modes.

jogos.title: The Bug Butcher
jogos.description: A fast paced action shooter inspired by the arcade classic Super Pang! Use a wide selection of weapons and powerups to tear through increasingly challenging levels.

jogos.title: Warhammer® 40,000: Dawn of War® II Chaos Rising
jogos.description: Em Dawn of War II: Chaos Rising, você assume o comando dos Blood Ravens e defende o setor contra os Fuzileiros Espaciais do Chaos da Legião Negra. Elimine a sujeira do Chaos e defenda o capítulo enquanto forças traiçoeiras agem de dentro para tentar derrubar os Blood Ravens.

jogos.title: Eon Altar
jogos.description: A role-playing game like no other. Your smartphone is your character! Eon Altar brings modern technology to the social experience of couch co-op gaming. Voice your character, choose which secrets to keep and what lies to tell. Gather your friends, order a pizza and descend to the depths of Eon Altar!

jogos.title: Bloodsports.TV
jogos.description: Co-Op Hero Defense set in a deadly post-apocalyptic Sweden. Team up with your friends and protect the Missile Silo against horrific beasts and outlaws.

jogos.title: Tabletop Playground
jogos.description: The modern digital tabletop game for fans and creators! Featuring deep customization and choice, enjoy more immersive tabletop sessions with friends than ever before. Build new rule sets for traditional games, play custom-made games by the community or create your own and share them with the world.

jogos.title: Psycho
jogos.description: ”Psycho” is a 3D horror game that allows you to explore and survive with your friends in the terrible mystery bunker.

jogos.title: Wave Break
jogos.description: Wave Break é o primeiro jogo de skateBARCO do mundo, inspirado nos clássicos arcades de skate. Faça grind, grab, kickflip e abra caminho a tiros neste mundo criminoso e explosivo, baseado no Miami Vice da década de 80.

jogos.title: Party Panic
jogos.description: Party Panic is an online and local-multiplayer party game. Compete against your friends in the all new board game, play 30+ rapid fire minigames, race through the brutal Gauntlet, or complete the challenges on Trophy Island. There is even a built in drinking game! You'll laugh, you'll cry, it_s stupid.

jogos.title: The Experiment: Escape Room
jogos.description: "The Experiment" is a multiplayer escape room puzzle game for virtual reality or desktop PC! You took part in an experiment that went out of control, can you escape the facilities before it_s too late?

jogos.title: Are You Smarter Than The Crowd?
jogos.description: You think you're a smart little fella, huh? Well, come on down and prove it in the "Are You Smarter Than The Crowd?" -gameshow! Compete with or against the crowd in a fun I.Q game, hosted by our lovely host!

jogos.title: Operator
jogos.description: Operator is a 4 player online co-op psychological horror game. You and your squad arrive in the woods, needing to collect 8 pages around the map while an unknown entity lurks in the shadows.

jogos.title: Castle of Shikigami 2
jogos.description: The second installment of the dramatic shooter that gained popularity in the arcades is now coming to Steam with +α elements!

jogos.title: Rocketbirds: Hardboiled Chicken
jogos.description: Aniquile o regime do pinguim do mal neste jogo de aventura cinemática, com campanhas solo completa e de cooperativa.

jogos.title: Contraption Maker
jogos.description: Contraption Maker is an open-ended sandbox puzzle game from the creators of The Incredible Machine. Build and solve elaborate contraptions with hamster motors, trampolines, alligators, wrecking balls, zombies, gears, lasers, ghosts, and over 100 more parts

jogos.title: Out of Ammo
jogos.description: Out of Ammo is an intense VR Tower Defense / FPS hybrid strategy game that will have you constructing defenses, calling in artillery, issuing orders, and taking direct control of your soldiers in order to survive a relentless enemy onslaught.

jogos.title: Rikki & Vikki
jogos.description: Puzzling Action for One or Two Players.

jogos.title: Hunted: The Demon’s Forge™
jogos.description: It will take the combined efforts of two great warriors to explore menacing dungeons, overgrown ruins, and downtrodden towns … and discover the secrets of the Demon’s Forge.

jogos.title: MONSTER HUNTER RISE - Peça de armadura em camadas de caçador "Máscara de Raposa"
We Were Here Too: Supporter Edition
Knight Squad
jogos.description: Knight Squad é um jogo caótico de combate em arena, para até 8 jogadores, capaz de destruir amizades. Enfrente amigos e futuros adversários em modos de jogo para lá de divertidos, do Último Bravo ao Futebol Medieval. E tudo usando apenas armas medievais... e pistolas laser... e metralhadoras.

jogos.title: Zombie Builder Defense
jogos.description: Zombie Builder Defense é um jogo de tiro cheio de ação sobre a sobrevivência do apocalipse zumbi com uma loja cheia de armas e torres.

jogos.title: WARMODE
jogos.description: Free to play shooter about the confrontation of two irreconcilable sides, represented by the government military housings and the armed hirelings. Try your hand at virtual battles with off-scale dynamics and hurricane gameplay in the spirit of the classical shooters.

jogos.title: Sniper Fury
jogos.description: Fúria Sniper é um jogo de ação num mundo ameaçado pela violência. Elimine ameaças com um enorme arsenal de poder de fogo moderno. Personalize arma, conjunto de equipamento e até as balas! Junte-se a outros snipers em Guerras de Clãs, os desafie no modo PvP e entre em eventos por surpresas.

jogos.title: Zorya: The Celestial Sisters ™
jogos.description: In this award-winning cooperative puzzle game, play along with a friend as either Aysu or Solveig and help bring back the night in this never sleeping world. But be careful, you must safely navigate the shadows to solve the increasingly complex puzzles.

jogos.title: Bubble Bobble 4 Friends: The Baron_s Workshop
jogos.description: Use your bubble-blowing abilities to trap your enemies and conquer a variety of stages in this action-puzzle game! Includes the original arcade game, The Baron is Back expansion, and a new exclusive Workshop Mode only on Steam!

jogos.title: AirMech Strike
jogos.description: AirMech® Strike is a fast paced Action-RTS game that can be played online competitively or cooperatively. Earn Kudos and Experience in battle and unlock a wide collection of AirMechs and Units while you practice the perfect strategy to emerge victorious!

jogos.title: Let_s Cook Together
jogos.description: Let_s Cook Together é um jogo de cooperação, bom para a família, para duas pessoas, jogue com seu cônjuge, filho filha, parente ou amogo.

jogos.title: Galcon 2: Galactic Conquest
jogos.description: Galcon 2 is a demolition derby in space! Send swarms of ships from planet to planet to conquer the galaxy in this fast paced multiplayer strategy game!

jogos.title: MONSTER HUNTER RISE - Peça de armadura em camadas de caçador "Orelhas de Felyno"
Labyrinth Legend
jogos.description: Labyrinth Legend é um RPG de ação com elementos de hack’n’slash. Explore masmorras geradas automaticamente, colete equipamentos poderosos, lute contra o desconhecido e inimigos formidáveis!

jogos.title: Re:Legend
jogos.description: Adventure with friends in a beautiful world of wonder and fantastic creatures. Build, craft, farm, fish and raise and breed amazing pet companions!

jogos.title: Dragon Extinction VR
jogos.description: Enter a fantasy world where humanity has brought dragons to the brink of extinction. This ARPG features hundreds of unique items, crafting and procedural dungeons.

jogos.title: The Red Solstice
jogos.description: 2280 A.D. Os últimos sobreviventes de uma Terra em ruínas procuram por um novo lar: Marte, um planeta hostil a forasteiros. The Red Solstice é um jogo de pelotão tenso e tático. Lute para sobreviver com até oito jogadores cooperativamente ou lidere seu próprio pelotão no modo de um jogador.

jogos.title: Retimed
jogos.description: Corra e desvie das rajadas de balas nos momentos tensos de câmera lenta. Desafie seus amigos para batalhas incríveis e frenéticas para até 4 jogadores localmente e/ou online.

jogos.title: Welcome to the Adventurer Inn!
jogos.description: Having just opened an inn, you set out to create a comfortable environment to bring in tired adventurers looking for respite after their questing. Earn money, upgrade your inn, and befriend a diverse cast of characters!

jogos.title: B.ARK
jogos.description: Help a heroic team of pets in mechs take back Earth in this exciting Saturday Morning Cartoon inspired shoot em’ up for both new and hardcore players.

jogos.title: Pode
jogos.description: Ajude Bulder e Glo em uma aventura repleta de enigmas desafiadores, e aprecie uma paisagem rica e artística que foi inspirada pela arte e cultura norueguesas.

jogos.title: Ms. Splosion Man
jogos.description: You got a problem? Yo, she’ll splode it. At the Big Science after-party celebrating the capture of Splosion Man, a spill of champagne shorts out the safety protocols on the splosionatrix and from it emerges Ms. Splosion Man. The latest creation from Twisted Pixel Games, the creators of Splosion Man, The Maw, and Comic Jumper, Ms.

jogos.title: Relic Hunters Zero: Remix
jogos.description: Relic Hunters Zero: Remix is a remaster of the FREE 1 million player hit game about blasting evil space ducks and turtles with tiny cute guns. It’s fast, it’s tactical, and feels deliciously smooth to play. Unlock new weapons, characters and relics to defeat the Ducan Commander!

jogos.title: The Metronomicon: Slay The Dance Floor
jogos.description: Rhythm Role Play Game; fight the weirdest monsters with the power of music! Level your party and upgrade your gear while dancing to the beat of some SICK tunes...

jogos.title: Retro Classix: Joe & Mac - Caveman Ninja
jogos.description: Grab your club and get ready to go on a wild, prehistoric adventure with the Cavemen Ninjas – Joe & Mac! Play as Joe and Mac, two cavemen who fight against enemy cavemen and dinosaurs using prehistoric weapons.

jogos.title: Death Crown
jogos.description: Death Crown is a minimalist real time strategy game in a 1bit style, where you will be play Death herself, commanding her legions of death, and punishing humanity_s Kingdom for its overconfidence.

jogos.title: Dead Effect 2 VR
jogos.description: Dead Effect 2 is the newest addition to the acclaimed Dead Effect franchise. This action sci-fi shooter is looking to push the boundaries of first-person shooters to new levels with slick graphics, rich narrative and RPG elements.

jogos.title: Windward
jogos.description: Windward is an action-filled multiplayer sandbox game that puts you in control of a ship sailing the high seas of a large procedurally-generated world.

jogos.title: Star Trek™: Starfleet Academy
jogos.description: A must for any fan, Star Trek: Starfleet Academy is an action/flight simulator featuring filmed footage of the original Star Trek actors. Take your place among the best and brightest at Starfleet Academy!

jogos.title: BLOCKADE
jogos.description: BLOCKADE Classic! First Person Shooter in an editable procedural cubic world. A large arsenal of weapons, 4 teams at the same time and up to 32 players on one map. A large number of game modes!

jogos.title: Time Warpers
jogos.description: Time Warpers is the evolution of the popular incremental game Time Clickers. With features like gun customization, optional permadeath & multiplayer, it combines a first person shooter with the seemingly endless progression & upgrades of a clicker game.

jogos.title: MONSTER HUNTER RISE - Voz de caçadora: Hinoa, a recrutadora
Black Ice
jogos.description: Jack into cyberspace at lightspeed in this FPS looter/shooter. Play solo or in online co-op/pvp with up to 10 people. Hack megacorps, outmaneuver their AI defenses, and steal their procedural loot to customize your arsenal of synergistic weaponry. Think Borderlands meets Tron. Hack the planet!

jogos.title: Dungeon Lords Steam Edition
jogos.description: The great wizard Galdryn of the Meadows has been vanquished by a deadly conspiracy within the Circle of Mages. His chief ally, Lord Davenmor, now struggles to save his kingdom from the dark forces of the conspiracy and the onslaught of Lord Barrowgrim’s army of marauders.

jogos.title: Borderlands Game of the Year Enhanced
jogos.description: Descubra o jogo de tiro e saque original, cheio de conteúdo e melhorias! Com progressão de RPG, seja um dos 4 mercenários rápidos no gatilho, equipe zilhões de armas e desbrave o planeta Pandora.

jogos.title: Divinity: Original Sin (Classic)
jogos.description: Gather your party and get ready for a new, back-to-the-roots RPG adventure! Discuss your decisions with companions; fight foes in turn-based combat; explore an open world and interact with everything and everyone you see. Join up with a friend to play online in co-op and make your own adventures with the powerful RPG toolkit.

jogos.title: Dragon Extinction
jogos.description: Entre em um mundo de fantasia onde a humanidade quase levou os dragões à extinção. Este RPG de Ação apresenta centenas de itens únicos, criação de itens e masmorras procedurais.

jogos.title: King 'n Knight
jogos.description: King ’n Knight is an arcade platform game that takes place in a medieval fantasy world. Play solo or co-op in this adventure inspired by the games of the 16-bit era.

jogos.title: Deluxe Content - Cossacks 3: Rise to Glory
Attack on Titan 2: Final Battle Upgrade Pack / A.O.T. 2: Final Battle Upgrade Pack / 進撃の巨人２ -Final Battle- アップグレードパック
Ylands
jogos.description: Ready to set sail towards an incredible adventure? Explore, build and play together with your friends in Ylands, a unique free-to-play sandbox adventure game. Build everything and anything you can imagine in Ylands' powerful Editor, then bring your creations alive with the magic of Visual Scripting.

jogos.title: No More Room in Hell
jogos.description: The chances of you surviving this all out war of society and the undead are slim to none. Already, there are millions of the walking dead shambling about, searching for food to eat. There_s no known cure. One bite can possibly end it all for you. However, you aren't alone in this nightmare.
jogos.developers: No More Room in Hell Team;

jogos.title: Hot Shot Burn
jogos.description: Hot Shot Burn é uma arena violenta e hilária para pancadaria em grupo do maior esporte televisionado no universo. É uma matança competitiva em ritmo acelerado, local ou online para 2-4 jogadores.

jogos.title: Robo Revenge Squad
jogos.description: Frankie’s Revenge é um jogo de ação cooperativo com robôs construídos a partir de utensílios domésticos. Os jogadores usam serras elétricas, globos de boate, lançadores de bolas de tênis e até mesmo um relógio de viagens no tempo para salvar o mundo das máquinas e acabar com os robôs alienígenas.

jogos.title: D-Corp
jogos.description: D-Corp is a couch co-op game for up to 4 players. Work together on tasks such as turret maintenance and harvesting natural resources while being under continuous attack by alien cacti!

jogos.title: Super Arcade Soccer 2021
jogos.description: SUPER ARCADE SOCCER 2021 combina o melhor da tecnologia atual com o estilo clássico dos jogos retrôs. Use suas melhores habilidades e molde sua estratégia para derrotar os outros competidores. Se você gosta de Sensible Soccer e Kick-Off, este jogo precisa fazer parte da sua coleção.

jogos.title: Mini Car Racing - Tiny Split Screen Tournament
jogos.description: Welcome to the one and only tiny split-screen racing tournament! Grab a friend (or none if no one is around), strap on your seat belt, and hit the road in more than 24 hot and lovely designed mini tracks. It’s fast, it’s fun, it’s exciting. It’s time for Mini Car Racing.

jogos.title: No Heroes Here
jogos.description: No Heroes Here é um jogo frenético para 1 a 4 jogadores, disponível nos modos local e online. Confeccione e use diversos itens enquanto coordena sua equipe de Não-Heróis para defender castelos e sobreviver! ...Ah, e salvar o reino no meio tempo também!

jogos.title: Battle Engine Aquila
jogos.description: The forces of the Forseti and the evil Muspell are in a fight to the death. You are Hawk Winter, plucked from obscurity to pilot Battle Engine Aquila. Airborne or on land, your tactics and Aquila_s firepower must combine to blaze a trail to lift the Forseti from oblivion.

jogos.title: Wurm Unlimited
jogos.description: Wurm Unlimited is the standalone version of the fantasy sandbox world Wurm Online, the MMORPG where the players are in charge! A pioneer in the ideas of player influence, crafting and adventure, it is now one of the most deep and feature packed true sandbox experiences available.

jogos.title: Farlight Commanders
jogos.description: Dirija uma nave espacial onde cada jogador tem um papel único. Jogue Solo ou Coop com amigos, até 4. Uma mistura perfeita de shoot em up espacial e jogo de plataforma de ação sci-fi. Lute no espaço ou no solo.

jogos.title: Warp Drive
jogos.description: Corrida de Teleporte em Alta Velocidade!

jogos.title: Arcade Mayhem Juanito
jogos.description: Arcade Mayhem Juanito revive todos os clássicos retrô em uma aventura animada em 2D que te enfrenta a todo tipo de inimigos e chefes épicos. Ponha o seu melhor pijama e ajude a defender os nossos jogos favoritos da invasão das Clonocélulas!

jogos.title: Aperture Tag: The Paint Gun Testing Initiative
jogos.description: Aperture Tag: The Paint Gun Testing Initiative is a Portal 2 Mod. It_s time to think with Gels! The Portal-Gun is gone, but the testing must go on! Grab the Paint-Gun Device and solve brand new test chambers in ways you've never solved them before!
jogos.developers: Odd Time Studios; Aperture Tag Team; Rockhopper Studios;

jogos.title: Jetman Go
jogos.description: Engage in multiplayer gunfights that you are free to fly in the sky play like no FPS you've played before. you can choose 4 guns with a totally level playing field and 18 beautiful maps with different strategies. Equip your jetpack and Fight in the sky!

jogos.title: My Free Farm 2
jogos.description: Are you ready for a very special challenge? Then get ready to discover My Free Farm 2! This simulation is a captivating blend of farm and tycoon game. Bring in the harvest, keep animals and expand your property. Download My Free Farm 2 now!

jogos.title: VERSUS SQUAD
jogos.description: Versus Squad is a fast action twin-stick shooter from the creator of Nation Red. Build your own sandbox defense and battle thousands of zombie mutants in top down combat! Face up to a dozen bosses. Simultaneously. Collect loot, build and repair. Play single player, on-line or local coop!

jogos.title: Unending Dusk
jogos.description: Unending Dusk is a retro inspired beat ‘em up ARPG set in a post-apocalyptic world. Play solo or with up to 4 players online and brawl your way through hordes of enemies. You play as an elite mercenary fighting against a dark force which has locked the Earth in a state of unending dusk.

jogos.title: Radio General
jogos.description: It_s WWII. You're a general sitting in a tent. All you have is a map, and a radio. Can you win the battle? Radio General is a unique strategy game where you interact with your units over the radio using speech recognition. Test your mettle and relive famous battles as a WWII general.

jogos.title: Simple Fish Adventure
jogos.description: Simple Fish Adventure is an unusual short physics-based platformer. Jump like a fish, think like a fish, be a fish! Overcome obstacles and suffer. Also includes co-op for up to 4 players.

jogos.title: Colossus Down
jogos.description: Junte-se a Nika, MechaNika, Agatha e o Porcão Sangrento nesta missão louca e peculiar de destruição de tudo que não é legal.

jogos.title: Rake
jogos.description: Do ghosts exist? What about Bigfoot, Chupacabras,Rake or Skinwalkers? And how will we ever know? You play as Gordon Davis, a scientist,a traveller and an explorer of unknown creatures and unusual events.

jogos.title: AI War: Fleet Command
jogos.description: "You are outgunned. You are massively outnumbered. You must win." These are your orders. Humanity has already fought its war against the machines -- and lost. AI death squads stand watch over every planet and every wormhole, the few remaining human settlements are held captive in orbiting bubbles, and the AIs have turned their...

jogos.title: Drox Operative 2
jogos.description: Drox Operative 2 is a starship action RPG with warring alien races, fierce space battles, a dynamic, evolving galaxy, and co-op multiplayer for Windows and Linux.

jogos.title: CITYCONOMY: Service for your City
jogos.description: É hora da faxina! Assuma os vários trabalhos de uma companhia de serviços municipais e tome conta de uma metrópole no vibrante CITYCONOMY, um simulador de economia urbana em mundo aberto.

jogos.title: Operation Flashpoint: Dragon Rising
jogos.description: Operation Flashpoint: Dragon Rising is a game about a fictitious conflict on one of the Sakhalin islands.

jogos.title: Dresden Files Cooperative Card Game
jogos.description: Play Harry Dresden and his friends as they take on the cases from the bestselling Dresden Files novels in the ultimate what-if scenario—what if Harry was on the scene with allies who weren’t there in the original story?

jogos.title: Lead and Gold: Gangs of the Wild West
jogos.description: Lead and Gold: Gangs of the Wild West é um jogo de tiro em terceira pessoa que proporciona uma experiência multijogador intensa baseada em equipes. Reviva a época violenta do Velho Oeste com ação cheia de adrenalina e batalhas rápidas com armas. Entre em batalhas arenosas em ambientes clássicos do Velho Oeste lindamente renderizados.

jogos.title: Colony Siege
jogos.description: Colony Siege combines the best of RTS and tower defense, including base building, mazing, and unit physics. Defend Earth_s remaining colonies using an arsenal of deadly weapons to torch, slice, throw, and impale swarms of alien invaders.

jogos.title: Eden Rising
jogos.description: Se prepare para um novo jogo de Mundo Aberto cheio de ação. Explore esse mundo gigante para coletar materiais para equipamentos e defesas. Use tudo o que estiver à sua disposição para defender suas bases e derrote hordas de monstros. Jogo sozinho ou online com até 8 jogadores!

jogos.title: UnEpic
jogos.description: Daniel was just an average guy. He was a great videogame player, a big fan of sci-fi movies, and a novice RPG player. In the midst of an RPG, he was teleported to a castle. At first, Daniel believed that he was having a massive hallucination.

jogos.title: Isles of Adalar
jogos.description: Isles of Adalar is an open world single player/co-op fantasy RPG that can be played in first or third person. The game is one part RPG one part RPG maker as it ships with an integrated level editor and Steam Workshop support. Users can mod the existing content or create their own.

jogos.title: Shank
jogos.description: Shank is the cult-classic revival of the sidescrolling beat-em-up. Play as Shank in an over-the-top grindhouse game, packed to the rim with enemies, bosses, combos, and more by the award-winning team at Klei Entertainment.

jogos.title: Feather
jogos.description: Feather é um jogo tranquilo de exploração e imersão em uma bela paisagem. Seja um pássaro, voe por aí e deixe-se levar pela serenidade zen, enquanto aprecia a relaxante música ambiente.

jogos.title: Atom Zombie Smasher
jogos.description: The zombie apocalypse is upon us and it_s up to you to evacuate everyone before they fall prey to the undead. Conduct massive rescue operations with a helping hand from snipers, artillery crews, orbital bombardments, and more.

jogos.title: Gensokyo Defenders
jogos.description: Use Traps and Spell Cards to fight back the magical masses! Blistering shoot-em-up action meets tactical tower defense as you choose from almost 20 popular characters to stop the fairy onslaught! Take advantage of their unique powers and tricky Traps to freeze, fry, and blow your enemies away!

jogos.title: Rogue Star Rescue
jogos.description: Insanidade ‘Bullet Hell' + Estratégia de Defesa da Torre. Rogue Star Rescue é um jogo ‘‘roguelike’ inovador. Abra caminho por diversos planetas enquanto resgata seus companheiros de equipe e pegue armadilhas para sua estratégia de defesa. Jogue sozinho ou online para deter a Rogue Star antes que ela aniquile tudo!

jogos.title: Lost Planet® 2
jogos.description: Lost Planet 2, the sequel to Lost Planet™: Extreme Condition, the landmark third-person shooter that sold over 2.3 million units worldwide, is now available on Steam!

jogos.title: Europa Universalis III Complete
jogos.description: Europa Universalis III Complete includes the original Europa Universalis III as well as the expansions In Nomine and Napoleons Ambition Europa Universalis III delves deeply into the areas of exploration, trade, warfare and diplomacy.

jogos.title: A Year Of Rain
jogos.description: Um reino que mantém-se ao ritmo de batalhas. Uma terra para quem tem muita ambição. A Year Of Rain é o jogo de estratégia em tempo real feito para equipes. Escolha sua facção, faça aliados e assuma o controle de um herói para liderar seus exércitos!

jogos.title: Megabyte Punch
jogos.description: Megabyte Punch is a fighting/beat ‘em up game in which you build your own fighter! As you travel through different environments, you battle other creatures to get their parts. Parts have their own powers and bonuses, like gun arms for a shoot ability or powerful hips for a devastating pelvic thrust attack.

jogos.title: Mini Thief
jogos.description: Consegue escapar com o saque? Jogue como o Master Thief e roube o máximo que conseguir. Arrombe casas para conseguir o doce, doce saque. Mas tenha cuidado para não ser apanhado!.

jogos.title: Shatter
jogos.description: Shatter is a retro-inspired brick-breaking game that merges familiar action with unique twists and a modern crafted production approach.

jogos.title: Crystal Raiders VR
jogos.description: Enter the castles full of treasures and dangers. Choose your weapon to fight, avoid traps and overcome obstacles to survive all the way through and to find the lost dwarven artefacts. Play alone or in co-op up to four players!

jogos.title: Crea
jogos.description: Progress with every slain monster, learn over 80 skills through talents, craft hundreds of items, and explore vast procedurally-generated worlds in this ever-expanding sandbox RPG!

jogos.title: Guardians of Orion (Phase 2)
jogos.description: Guardians of Orion is a Sci-Fi Action RPG Looter Shooter with Dinosaurs and Robots. Complete Mission Objectives all over the Galaxy with your friends to earn new Gear & Rewards!

jogos.title: Xenon Racer
jogos.description: Estamos em 2030, a era dos veículos voadores. Foi organizado um campeonato de veículos, com carros elétricos de última tecnologia movidos a xenônio. Derrape por cidades como Tóquio e Dubai o mais rápido que puder e conquiste a glória eterna!

jogos.title: BFF or Die
jogos.description: BFF or Die is a cozy/crazy couch co-op puzzle-action game for one to four players. As time traveling aliens you’re sent on a risky rescue mission to Earth! Use your gadgets collaboratively to overcome danger and survive as a team.

jogos.title: CastleStorm
jogos.description: Welcome to the world of CastleStorm, a super genre mashup of 2D physics destruction mashed with tower defense brawler! CastleStorm was born out of the fond childhood memory of building and destroying LEGO castles.

jogos.title: Techno Tanks
jogos.description: Techno Tanks is an intense, fast-paced arcade-inspired tanks game. It’s a lot of fast fun and a must-have if you enjoy arcade games.

jogos.title: Super Bit Blaster XL
jogos.description: Uma reminiscência SUPER do bairro clássico de comer jogos de arcade dos anos 80. Super Bit Blaster XL é uma versão (ainda mais) aprimorada do estilo retro, viciante e rápido dos jogos de arcade!

jogos.title: GangV | VR & PC Battle Royale
jogos.description: GANGV é um Battle Royale em um ambiente de vida com tráfego, multidões e aplicação da lei! Roubar dinheiro, equipamentos e veículos e enfrentar as conseqüências. Esconda-se entre os civis para matar seus oponentes.

jogos.title: Semispheres
jogos.description: Semispheres é um jogo de quebra-cabeças paralelos para meditação que tem como desafio central apresentar realidades duplas. A interface com duas telas para apenas um jogador desafia seu cérebro ao colocá-lo em controle de duas personagens simultaneamente.

jogos.title: Men of War: Vietnam
jogos.description: The critically acclaimed series returns! Experience Vietnam from both sides of the war.

jogos.title: Krater
jogos.description: The game brings you far into the future of a post-apocalyptic Sweden.

jogos.title: Villagers and Heroes
jogos.description: O melhor RPG Online! Batalhas, Montarias, e Fabricação de Itens e Equipamentos!

jogos.title: Aces of the Luftwaffe - Squadron
jogos.description: The Aces of the Luftwaffe have returned! Dodge a hail of bullets and face their fearsome war machines in bombastic air battles and boss fights!

jogos.title: Eximius: Seize the Frontline
jogos.description: EXIMIUS is a FPS/RTS hybrid that focuses on squad-based combat. The game features an intense 5v5 multiplayer experience with each team comprising of 4 Squad Officers and one Commander.

jogos.title: Deluxe Content - Cossacks 3: The Golden Age
Over My Dead Body (For You)
jogos.description: Play as a Ghost and a Zombie at the same time! Solve puzzles by working together. Attack enemies, throw objects, possess the weak-minded, and more in this 20 level game. Test your skills in 10 super hard challenge levels.

jogos.title: Vertical Drop Heroes HD
jogos.description: Vertical Drop Heroes is a procedural platformer RPG hybrid with roguelike elements, where your hero adventures through randomly generated stages. Armed with a variety of skills and traits, you must use your cunning and reflexes to survive the dangers of each stage.

jogos.title: Super Mega Baseball 2
jogos.description: The critically acclaimed Super Mega Baseball series is back with new visuals, deep team and league customization, and online multiplayer modes.

jogos.title: CounterAttack
jogos.description: CounterAttack is a side scrolling space shooter (shmup). Team up or fight solo, 1 - 4 player local or up to 8 players online coop, unlock upgrades, use powerful ultimate abilities, enhance your ship the way you want, and save the Earth from annihilation.

jogos.title: Deadbeat Heroes
jogos.description: The Prime Sinister’s reign of chaos has Londoners shaking in their boots! Air-dash, wall-run and rocket-punch your way through garish goons & badass bosses as you use your super-powered gauntlet to bring evil-doers to justice!

jogos.title: Project Starship X
jogos.description: O jogo de tiro Rogue-Lite no qual você DETONA abominações cômicas! ​Pilote sua nave espacial como Swagthulhu nesta original e maluca paródia "Lovecraftiana"!

jogos.title: BLOCKPOST
jogos.description: Procedural cubic 3D-shooter in the best traditions of the genre. The game is a rich cocktail consisting of the most popular and functional gaming solutions. Customization of characters, opening cases and improving the existing arsenal — all this is available in the game now.

jogos.title: Monica e a Guarda dos Coelhos
jogos.description: MÔNICA E A GUARDA DOS COELHOS é um jogo cooperativo local, de um a quatro jogadores. Controlando um grupo de heróis da Turma da Mônica, todo mundo precisará exercer um papel e defender castelos!

jogos.title: Fated Kingdom
jogos.description: Fated Kingdom is an old school digital board game sandbox for 2-4 players with shared physical space and no rules enforced by computer. The Kingdom of Kinmarr is falling apart, and to survive in this dark times, players need to roll the dice, draw cards from the decks and move along a game board.

jogos.title: Escape Quest
jogos.description: Embark on an escape game adventure alone or with up to 3 friends. Set in a medieval fantasy world, communication & observation will be your key tools to succeed and free yourself.

jogos.title: Master of Orion
jogos.description: O ascendente jogo de estratégia de exploração do espaço está de volta! Um novo capítulo da épica saga de Master of Orion está pronto para capturar mais uma vez a imaginação de milhões de jogadores.

jogos.title: Last Farewell
jogos.description: Last Farewell is a Survival Co-op game where you are tasked to work together with others (or solo) in order to ensure your own survival for as long as possible. Gather supplies and craft during the day in order to protect yourself and the sanctuary, the Town Hall, during the night.

jogos.title: MONSTER HUNTER RISE - Música "Kamura Village: Summer Remix"
Zombies Ate My Neighbors and Ghoul Patrol
jogos.description: Enjoy 16-bit console gaming with the cult classic Zombies Ate My Neighbors and its sequel, Ghoul Patrol!

jogos.title: Bhop PRO
jogos.description: BhopPRO is an amazing game mode where players have to jump on blocks

jogos.title: Abyss Odyssey
jogos.description: From indie Chilean developer ACE Team comes a new side-scrolling action adventure game featuring a complex fighting engine in procedurally generated levels that destines its three warriors to battle a different abyss each time! Choose your hero and also learn to possess your enemies in the abyss…

jogos.title: Bunker Defense
jogos.description: Bunker Defense is a tower defense game for 1-4 players. Waves of enemies attack your base, and you must defend it by building different kinds of defenses.

jogos.title: Containment Initiative
jogos.description: Containment Initiative is a local co-op VR shooter which can be played by two people on the same PC. Kill zombies alone in VR or have a friend cover you by using the mouse and keyboard. Features include realistic weapon reloading as well as a variety of unlockable guns, upgrades, and loot to find.

jogos.title: Stowaway
jogos.description: An 10 player online social deduction game inspired by games like Among Us & Town of Salem, where the stowaway is tasked with killing the crew before they reach land!

jogos.title: The Timeless Child - Prologue
jogos.description: The Timeless Child is a 2-player puzzle-adventure coop game with first-person view. Embark on a journey, through time and space, to save Emily Wells from her endless temporal jail.

jogos.title: Can't Drive This
jogos.description: Corra com seu caminhão monstro ENQUANTO seu amigo constrói a pista. Se for devagar, você EXPLODE! Sim, é tão caótico quanto parece - especialmente em quatro jogadores com tela dividida.

jogos.title: Wulverblade
jogos.description: Defeat the Ninth Legion of the Roman army in this side-scrolling, arcade-inspired beat 'em up set in Roman-era Britain.

jogos.title: Scourge: Outbreak
jogos.description: Blast your way through Nogari Island as Echo Squad. Utilize a devastating array of weapons and special abilities to crush everything that stands in your way. Features a fully Co-op enabled Campaign for up to 4 Players, as well as a variety of 8 Player Versus multiplayer modes!

jogos.title: Monstrum 2
jogos.description: Monstrum 2 is a survival horror game for 2-5 players, set inside the procedurally-generated sea labyrinth - Sparrowlock. Join a team of prisoners evading the terrors within whilst figuring out how to escape, or become one of the deadly monstrosities whose only goal is to hunt them down.

jogos.title: Redeemer: Enhanced Edition
jogos.description: REDEEMER is a intense Brawler where you will punch, hack and blast your way through enemies using fists, hammers, fire arms and even the environment.

jogos.title: Bite the Bullet
jogos.description: Corra, atire e coma tudo que estiver na frente neste roguelite RPG de tiro. Num mundo onde o inimigo é comestível, o que você come e quanto come afeta tudo, incluindo seu quadril, sua árvore de habilidades e até mesmo na confeccção de armas.

jogos.title: Primal Carnage
jogos.description: A savage online shooter, where players do battle as man or beast in class-based deathmatches and a frantic escape mode. Unleash your inner dinosaur!

jogos.title: Guacamelee! Super Turbo Championship Edition
jogos.description: A versão definitiva do grande sucesso em ação com plataformas ao estilo "Metroidvania", Guacamelee! Super Turbo Championship Edition (STCE), traz novos níveis, poderes, desafios e melhorias à desastrada e divertida aventura original, inspirada na temática mexicana.

jogos.title: Death Tales
jogos.description: Play as a new reaper, completing quests, collecting spells, and gathering equipment to fight through hordes of enemies in this grim but whimsical 2D adventure!

jogos.title: Brunch Club
jogos.description: Welcome To Brunch Club - A 1-4 player game about food with a seasoning of pop culture. Each level and game mode providing you with difficult tasks to complete and put strain upon your friendships, with leader boards to compete on will you get the best time possible?

jogos.title: Tabletopia
jogos.description: Tabletopia is a sandbox virtual table with high-quality board games and ready setups. Already 2000+ games and counting! Play how you want with whom you want: guests don’t need accounts to play. Or make your own games, no programming skills required.

jogos.title: CHESS with LASERS
jogos.description: Obliterate the enemy_s king with your laser by strategically moving/rotating mirrors, portals and more in this mind-bending chess-like game. Challenge your friends or battle an AI (includes Level Editor)!

jogos.title: Soccering
jogos.description: Soccering is the little sibling of Volleying! Thus, as another physics-based game, it also gives the players more control over their moves, delivering unique matches each round. Invite your friends over or play remotely and enjoy this predictably unpredictable experience!

jogos.title: Eronoctosis: Put Yourself Together
jogos.description: A 2-Player Networked Horror Co-Op game. Explore the deepest recesses of your mind to put yourself back together. Work together to defend yourself from its denizens.

jogos.title: Dawn of the Monsters
jogos.description: The cataclysmic battle between giant monsters has begun in this manga-inspired, side-scrolling, kaiju beat-'em-up!

jogos.title: Dogfight 1942
jogos.description: Piloting a wide range of aircraft, players engage in aerial dogfights and dangerous fighter missions across the major theaters of war during WWII.

jogos.title: Cannibal Cuisine
jogos.description: O deus Hoochooboo está com fome... de você. Mas, como todo bom cozinheiro canibal sabe, servir é melhor do que ser servido. Corte legumes, frutas e turistas e sirva suas delícias divinas à moda fliperama com até 4 chefs!

jogos.title: Forbidden Ingress
jogos.description: Nosso mundo está em perigo! Pegue sua arma e pare esses convidados indesejados!

jogos.title: Bob Was Hungry
jogos.description: Bob Was Hungry is a challenging precision platformer with many levels designed to truly test your platforming skills. Play alone or online with 2-8 player co-op and make your way through countless perils to feed your bob!

jogos.title: MONSTER HUNTER RISE - Peça de armadura em camadas de caçador "Brincos Serperianos"
Guns of Icarus Online
jogos.description: Assemble your crew, take to the skies in the premier PvP airship combat game. Guns of Icarus Online is all about flying massive airships, shooting big turret weapons, and working as a team for supremacy of the skies. Everyone as one, victory or death, together.

jogos.title: The Walking Vegetables
jogos.description: It’s the 1980’s and an evil alien race has invaded Earth, turning all vegetables into crawling, bawling, mauling abominations. You are about to join Department Radical, the grooviest police force on Earth. Are you a rad enough dude (or dame) to smite these ravenous creatures?

jogos.title: Serious Sam HD: The Second Encounter
jogos.description: Serious Sam HD: The Second Encounter is a visually upgraded and fully Steam supported remake of the original high-adrenaline single-play and 16-player co-operative arcade-action FPS and Gamespot_s Game of the Month!

jogos.title: Cry of Fear
jogos.description: Cry of Fear is a psychological single-player and co-op horror game set in a deserted town filled with horrific creatures and nightmarish delusions. You play as a young man desperately searching for answers in the cold Scandinavian night, finding his way through the city as he slowly descends into madness.

jogos.title: World Of Robots
jogos.description: World of Robots is the tactical online shooter with simple controls

jogos.title: Pro Cycling Manager 2020
jogos.description: Dirija uma equipe de ciclismo e leve-a até o topo! Você terá que gerenciar as finanças e o recrutamento, planejar os treinos, implementar sua estratégia e, pela primeira vez, cuidar dos seus ciclistas e do moral deles!

jogos.title: White Noise Online
jogos.description: A fully cooperative horror experience like never before! On White Noise Online, a team of up to 4 investigators has to explore an area looking for clues, while avoiding being devoured by a supernatural creature. Will you be able to uncover the truth behind the mysterious events?

jogos.title: Another road
jogos.description: This is an epic humorous adventure. You play as crazy men in underpants who ride a disgusting cart and try to deliver goods. COOL, YEAH?

jogos.title: Zeno Clash 2
jogos.description: Ghat_s story is far from over: Zeno Clash 2 picks up where the deliciously brazen first game left off. After 4 years of waiting, the sequel to the surreal first-person brawler brings more variety in combat and levels, and even more bizarre storytelling into the beguiling world of Zenozoik.

jogos.title: MONSTER HUNTER RISE - Música de fundo "Monster Music: Dance Version"
HELLFRONT: HONEYMOON
jogos.description: HELLFRONT: HONEYMOON é um jogo intenso de ação e estratégia, feito para ser aproveitado com amigos durante uma tarde tomando suco. Uma tela, um vencedor! Bem-vindo ao HELLFRONT.

jogos.title: Peekaboo Lite
jogos.description: Peekaboo — A Cross-Platform Hide & Seek online game. Players are divided into two teams: Props and Hunters. Props hide, taking the form of objects and adopting their physical properties, and hunters try with all their might to find them.

jogos.title: Infestation: Survivor Stories 2020
jogos.description: Infestation is a Survival Horror MMO that immerses players in a zombie-infested, post-apocalyptic world in which a viral outbreak has decimated the human population leaving in its wake, a nightmare of epic proportion.

jogos.title: Making it Home
jogos.description: A vehicle building game. Put your engineering, design and creativity skills to the test as you combine simple elements into complex contraptions. Jump around your vehicle to keep it moving and overcome challenges in the campaign, or just relax and build your dream machine in the cozy mode!

jogos.title: Ballistic Tanks
jogos.description: Ballistic Tanks is the best tank game you've played since the 80_s. Battle in exhilarating local multiplayer, or challenge yourself in an intense solo/co-op arcade mode. Play 5 game modes in over 50 maps; and destroy your enemies in a frenzy of bullets, lasers, and explosions!

jogos.title: MONSTER HUNTER RISE - Peça de armadura em camadas de caçador "Cauda de Felyno"
Tiny Brains
jogos.description: "Tiny Brains" is a cooperative action puzzler that follows four super-powered lab animals in their attempt to escape a mad scientist_s experiments. In this joyously chaotic multiplayer game, the four "Tiny Brains" must combine their unique physics-based powers to navigate through a trick-ridden maze.

jogos.title: Bud Spencer & Terence Hill - Slaps And Beans
jogos.description: Bud Spencer e Terence Hill em sua primeira aventura virtual. Slaps and Beans é um beat' em up cooperativo para um ou dois jogadores com elementos de plataforma e mini-games onde você interpreta personagens de Bud Spencer e Terence Hill.

jogos.title: Wing Breakers
jogos.description: Wing Breakers é corrida de batalha aérea extrema com vacas loucas. Sobreviva a lutas aéreas caóticas cheias de aviões com mísseis teleguiados, drones ameaçadores e animais furiosos. Jogue sozinho ou junte-se a outros jogadores online. Derrote-os todos e se torne o herói de Wing Breakers!

jogos.title: Halloween tá Lokasso
jogos.description: Um jogo roguelike sobre esqueletos, abóboras e morcegos. Siga e explore os cenários macabros e derrote as forças dos altares malignos. Encontre armas, itens e amiguinhos diferentes para te ajudar na tua missão. Escolha sua arma com cautela, cada uma possui uma habilidade especial distinta.

jogos.title: Particubes (Open Alpha)
jogos.description: Make your own items and worlds, share them, hang out and play with your friends. Enter a world made out of cubes where creativity has no limit!

jogos.title: ROGUE SHIFT
jogos.description: ROGUE SHIFT is a high-intensity top-down shooter with rogue-lite elements and character progression, set on a harsh planet that will test your will to survive.

jogos.title: EMERGENCY 3
jogos.description: Their lives are in your hands - can you take the pressure? In this re-release of the classic EMERGENCY 3 it_s your job to save lifes! Command many different first responder units in an exciting mix of simulation and real-time strategy.

jogos.title: Happenlance
jogos.description: Climb huge mountains, impale hundreds of enemies, and solve tricky physics puzzles... all using only a spear. Pole-vault yourself to victory in this epic joust-'em-up adventure — or face your friends in online co-op and PvP multiplayer!
jogos.developers: Phillip Trudeau-Tavara; Miles Fogle; Cyborg Primate;

jogos.title: Scribble It!
jogos.description: Adrenaline fueled, fast paced drawing action. Draw fast, guess faster and win it all! THOUSANDS of official words in 17 different languages. 4 multiplayer game modes with up to 16 players and a singleplayer mode. We take you back to the heated pictionary games everyone had in school!

jogos.title: Bonkies
jogos.description: Bonkies é um jogo cooperativo bem divertido com uma pitada de construção! Reúna os seus amigos, equipe o seu propulsor movido a bananas e o seu braço robótico e erga construções malucas pelo cosmos, pela glória dos primatas! Torne-se o CHIMpeão da construção espacial!

jogos.title: Inversion™
jogos.description: Don't just defy gravity. Command it. Master the fundamental forces of gravity and save the world.

jogos.title: Red Risk
jogos.description: Volunteers fight in a bloody contest for freedom and money. Play as one of three volunteers armed with their favorite weapons, survive waves of enemies and bosses. Red Risk will put you into a bloody tournament, will you survive?

jogos.title: Zombie Vikings
jogos.description: From the creators of indie smash hit Stick It to The Man! comes a new one to four-player co-op stab-you-in-the-gut-a-thon. Embark on a dead funny adventure with the Zombie Vikings. A putrid posse sent on a mission through the most epic of worlds to retrieve Odin’s lost eye.

jogos.title: Raiders Of The Lost Island
jogos.description: Raiders of the Lost Island é um jogo cooperativo LOCAL em que até 4 jogadores competem para saquear tesouros de uma ilha que está afundando, enquanto constroem um barco para sobreviver à onda final.

jogos.title: Freefall Tournament
jogos.description: A space marines team-based TPS (third person shooter).

jogos.title: Deadburg
jogos.description: Deadburg is a co-op survival game set in a procedurally generated city with thousands of buildings to explore and zombies to kill. Every building you see can be explored, exploited and destroyed one block at a time. Play alone or with friends and discover the secrets of the city.

jogos.title: Song of the Myrne: What Lies Beneath
jogos.description: Explore the island of Namok and its dungeon, both of them full of adventures, dangers and big bosses. Craft new armors, weapons, potions, etc... Meet the crazy townfolks and discover the secrets that lie beneath Namok.

jogos.title: Left to Survive: Shooter PVP
jogos.description: Left to Survive is an action shooter game with the post-apocalyptic world setting with a base building feature. Become a hero, challenge other players, join tournaments, raid bases. Would you be able to survive in a dead world?

jogos.title: Journey Of Life
jogos.description: You're an engineer who lost his entire fortune overnight. You've been forced to leave your home and start from scratch. Explore the game world, build settlements, and create alliances with other players. You'll never be bored again!

jogos.title: AFL Evolution 2
