jogos.description: THE EVOLUTION CONTINUES - AFL Evolution 2 is taking AFL gaming to new heights with more features than ever before!

jogos.title: Boppio
jogos.description: Boppio is a game about obtaining materials, constructing buildings, and assembling a spaceship to return home. In order to succeed you will need to automate and optimize your base. Mine minerals and combine them into new items that will help you build your return vessel.

jogos.title: Hell Warders
jogos.description: Resista onda após onda de ataques das proles infernais com um arsenal de armas, rasgue ao meio seus terríveis comandantes com suas poderosas habilidades heróicas e coloque em jogo seus cavaleiros, arqueiros e magos para derrotar o Inferno!

jogos.title: Spooky Chase
jogos.description: O jogo que transforma você em seu próprio inimigo!

jogos.title: Next Day: Survival
jogos.description: Next Day is a multi-player SURVIVAL game with elements of RPG, in an imaginary country in Eastern Europe. Carry out an array of tasks, learn skills, and develop your character. Have shootouts with opponents and earn a reputation.

jogos.title: KungFu Kickball
jogos.description: KungFu Kickball é um jogo de desporto e combate no qual ganha quem pontapear melhor! Esmurra, pontapeia e cabeceia até fazeres a bola bater no sino do adversário para amealhares pontos!

jogos.title: Koloro
jogos.description: Between dreams and nightmares, “Koloro” tells the tale of a young pink hair girl named Kora who embarks on a quest to find her missing sister through a stunning Puzzle-Platformer crafted by Sköll Studio.

jogos.title: Black Paradox
jogos.description: Buckle up for shoot ‘em up chaos in this fast-paced and hyper-stylized roguelite. As the infamous bounty hunter Black Paradox, it’s up to you to travel through space and defeat the Hellraisers – the most dangerous criminal organization in the galaxy.

jogos.title: Swords of Gurrah
jogos.description: Swords of Gurrah is a real time multiplayer sword fighting VR game. Fight with or against friends, with battles up to 12 players. Choose from over a huge variety of weapons and create a fighting style of your own!

jogos.title: DRAGON QUEST HEROES™ II
jogos.description: DRAGON QUEST HEROES II is a hack-and-slash Action RPG that sends you on a new adventure to restore order to a once peaceful world filled with monsters and battles of epic proportions. Up to 4 players can play in cooperative multiplayer to defeat an unknown threat looming over the Seven Realms!
jogos.developers: Square Enix; KOEI TECMO GAMES CO., LTD.;

jogos.title: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing II
jogos.description: In the second part of the unfolding saga that could also be enjoyed independently, you can explore new corners of this unique world and experience the mix of old-school gothic and mad science, with more action, powerful foes and plenty of stunning places to visit.

jogos.title: 傲世霸主
jogos.description: ★客服服务★ 官方客服QQ：642522855，添加客服QQ即可领取游戏大礼包和参加相应的线下活动，并可以解决游戏问题 PS：添加时记得备注游戏名和角色名

jogos.title: Pagan: Absent Gods
jogos.description: Pagan: Absent Gods é um RPG hack-and-slash de ação rápida que desafiará sua habilidade em combates brutais e gratificantes contra inúmeros inimigos e chefes descomunais. Domine todos os heróis, cada um com seu estilo de jogo próprio e único.

jogos.title: Raging Justice
jogos.description: A cidade está um caos! Com crime e corrupção em todos os cantos, tudo depende de uma equipe eficaz de rebeldes procuradores para limpar as ruas com um pouco de justiça! Raging Justice é um clássico de ataques, pontapés e gritos no século XXI.

jogos.title: Color Breakers
jogos.description: Color Breakers é um jogo multijogador cooperativo local e online para 1 a 4 pessoas. Os jogadores devem trabalhar juntos em cada um dos níveis para completar o máximo de pinturas.

jogos.title: Vectorio - Early Access
jogos.description: A simple survival base-building game. Claim resources, unlock new technology, expand your defenses, and fight back against the ever growing onslaught of enemy shapes! Play for free now.

jogos.title: Voyage
jogos.description: Em busca do caminho de casa, dois sobreviventes viajam para desvendar os mistérios do passado.

jogos.title: Come on Baby!
jogos.description: Festival de esportes muito engraçado de super bebês exclusivos! Mais de 28+ corridas hypersports no verão e inverno! Não pode imaginar! Este jogo!

jogos.title: Double Dragon Trilogy
jogos.description: A groundbreaking, uber-popular game upon its arcade debut in 1987. Double Dragon is the undisputed godfather of co-op beat ‘em up.

jogos.title: Morkredd
jogos.description: Morkredd é um jogo de quebra-cabeças cheio de tensão para até duas pessoas que aplica os princípios da física para misturar enigmas desafiadores, o delicado equilíbrio entre a luz e as sombras e um mundo tenebroso repleto de segredos a desvendar.

jogos.title: Clan N
jogos.description: Fight alone or with your friends, master the art of battle and bring peace back to the land in this arcade inspired epic brawler!

jogos.title: Abduction Bit
jogos.description: Abduction Bit is a NES-like arcade based on elements of some timeless classics from 80_s (Bubble Bobble, Ice Climber, Mario Bros).

jogos.title: Speedy Golf
jogos.description: A golf racing game where you chase after your golf shots

jogos.title: Asterix & Obelix XXL 2
jogos.description: Astérix & Obélix XXL 2 é a experiência suprema proposta pelo jogo inicial. Os novos grafismos dignificam a banda desenhada e o gameplay foi totalmente reajustado de modo a aperfeiçoar as lutas contra os romanos!

jogos.title: Suspect Enemy
jogos.description: Team game for 4-10 people in which there is a killer and crewmate.

jogos.title: Ultrawings
jogos.description: Ultrawings é o primeiro jogo de aviação de mundo aberto em que você usa mãos virtuais para voar em várias aeronaves e completar diversas missões em um belo mundo repleto de ilhas!

jogos.title: Serious Sam Classic: The Second Encounter
jogos.description: Serious Sam Classic: The Second Encounter is a high-adrenaline single-play and 16-player co-operative arcade-action FPS and Gamespot_s Game of the Month February 2002!

jogos.title: Braveland Heroes
jogos.description: The famous Braveland series returns! Destroy your enemies in online duels and uncover the secret of the king_s scepter in this new turn-based strategy game.

jogos.title: Resident Evil: Operation Raccoon City
jogos.description: Experience the Fear: Set in the terrifying world of Resident Evil.

jogos.title: FSX: Steam Edition - Piper PA-34-200T Seneca II Add-On
Tango Fiesta – 80’s Action Film meets 2D Top Down Multiplayer Co-Op Roguelike Military Shooter
jogos.description: Tango Fiesta is a top-down cooperative shooter for 1-4 players. Imagine the events from every single 80’s action film ever made actually happened to one guy - well you & up to 3 friends get to blast, shoot & knife your way through procedurally generated levels as the ultimate one (or 2, 3, or 4) man army!

jogos.title: Wanted Killer VR
jogos.description: Choose from a team of unique heroes and use their skills to fight your way through the ranks of the evil corporation that’s trying to wipe you out. Upgrade your arsenal and use bullet-time to take out your enemies in style. Fast-paced arcade action and one-of-a-kind gunplay – this is Wanted Killer VR!

jogos.title: Super Sports Blast
jogos.description: Vôlei, Tênis ou Futebol - escolha seu esporte favorito, vá para o campo e prepare-se para se divertir !!

jogos.title: Saints Row: The Third Initiation Station
jogos.description: Create, share, and download the most outlandish characters you've ever seen, then upload them for play in Saints Row: The Third. Inside every Sinner is a Saint.

jogos.title: SCP: Secret Laboratory
jogos.description: Deep within the SCP Foundation during a containment breach, many of the anomalies have bypassed security and escaped from their chambers - without peaceful intentions. Become site personnel, a re-containment agent, or an anomalous entity and fight to take control of or escape the facility!

jogos.title: Oasis VR
jogos.description: Oasis is an amazing virtual environment where you can make new friends around the world! You can chat with them, play poker, go bowling, or even arrange a home party in several virtual worlds. You can also create your own avatars for you and your friends!

jogos.title: SCP: Containment Breach Multiplayer
jogos.description: Free multiplayer survival horror game based on stories from the SCP Foundation Wiki. The game is about a facility containing anomalous entities known as SCPs. When a catastrophic containment breach occurs at a facility, your goal is to get out of the facility. Try to escape with your friends!

jogos.title: Calturin and Clone
jogos.description: Calturin and Clone is a 2D co-op action RPG where you can either play as a lone adventurer or with a fellow wizard. Mainly focused on difficult boss fights and other challenging encounters that are not combat, Calturin and Clone will test you and your friend_s skills to the limit.

jogos.title: Ragdoll Party Online
jogos.description: Create your own level with your friends online in the sandbox mode, play the mini-games, ragdoll, drive a car, fly with a Jetpack, fart to go higher, throw grenades. Access more than 45 items to build your own level.

jogos.title: Nature Treks: Together
jogos.description: Nature Treks: Together is a place to connect with others using a combination of shape, color, and sound. Or simply relax on your own. Intuitively transition deeper to rediscover the benefits of expression, the value of emotion, and escape into a powerful sensory experience.

jogos.title: Don't Bite Me Bro! +
jogos.description: Don't Bite Me Bro! is a 1-4 Player Couch Co-op open-world zombie apocalypse game. Explore the world for resources, find and save survivors throughout the world, each which become playable characters with unique traits and abilities.

jogos.title: Frontline Zed
jogos.description: Defenda sua barricada fortificada durante a noite, colete armas e faça reparações durante o dia. Sobreviva tempo suficiente para atravessar a América e chegar ao salvamento,

jogos.title: Jamestown+
jogos.description: Set sail for 17th-century British Colonial Mars in Jamestown+: a cooperative shoot-em-up for 1-4 brave souls, designed to be exciting for players of all skill levels.

jogos.title: Thunder Wolves
jogos.description: When this “wolf pack” strikes, you hear the thunder roll. The Thunder Wolves attack from the air. They are mercenaries, and the best helicopter pilots in the world. Every one of them is ready for action at all times—and ready to fight evil, wherever it lurks. The Thunder Wolves have already made it through countless battles.

jogos.title: Quest Rooms
jogos.description: You wake up in an obscure room, a voice on the TV says that it is just a quest where you have to find the way out. Brute force is not enough to survive to get out of the room you will have to be patient, use your brain and have grit.

jogos.title: Under Lock
jogos.description: Under Lock is a multiplayer asymmetrical PvP horror game for 5 players (4 survivors versus 1 monster). Take the role of a survivor with the goal to outsmart the monster and escape from lockdown. Or choose one from several unique monsters to hunt down and devour the victims.

jogos.title: Shatter Keep
jogos.description: Shatter Keep is an asymmetrical multiplayer game where 3 survivor players try to escape the castle and 1 player attempts to eliminate them. Survivors must complete a list of objectives to open the castle exits while arming traps, lighting torches and avoiding the monster before the timer expires.

jogos.title: Blacklist Brigade
jogos.description: Blacklist Brigade is a co-op focused top-down shooter game, where players as a part of a mercenary group fight against banana republic dictators and other evil scoundrels.

jogos.title: Killer: Infected One of Us
jogos.description: This is a casual online first-person game for 4-10 players in which you have to identify the infected and cured him or be infected and infect everyone!

jogos.title: Asterix & Obelix: Slap them All!
jogos.description: Asterix & Obelix, return in a new adventure full of slaps! Play as Asterix and Obelix and cross the most iconic landscapes of the saga while facing a host of enemies, in a Beat Them Up filled with action ... and slaps!

jogos.title: Frontlines™: Fuel of War™
jogos.description: Frontlines™: Fuel of War™ is an open-world First Person Shooter set on the frontlines of tomorrow. In a world ravaged by a global energy crisis, environmental decay, and economic depression, players assume the role of an elite soldier in the Western Coalition Army on an epic crusade against the Red Star Alliance to control the last of...

jogos.title: Rune Knights
jogos.description: Rune Knights is a cooperative action RPG focused on customization, crafting, and combat. Customize your character_s aesthetics, stats, and gameplay as you battle through procedurally generated and hand-crafted levels with your allies.

jogos.title: Tree Simulator 2022
jogos.description: It_s exactly what it sounds like, but now with 100% more multiplayer. You are the tree and so is everyone else! You are equaled by no other, except maybe the forest... Relax and be the best tree you can be.

jogos.title: Super Cane Magic ZERO - Legend of the Cane Cane
jogos.description: Equipe-se, coma pedras, atire bumerangues-banana e lute contra uma Batata Gigante! Explore um mundo enorme, desbloqueie mais de 15 personagens jogáveis e recolha centenas de itens e habilidades neste RPG de ação cooperativo para até 4 jogadores! Com 8 arenas PVP locais.

jogos.title: Trailblazers
jogos.description: Prepare-se para emoção e velocidade numa explosão de cores no Trailblazers, o primeiro jogo de corridas arcade cooperativo e segundo a segundo. Pinte a pista com linhas de corrida dinâmicas, impulsione com a cor da sua equipe e alcance as vitórias!

jogos.title: Binarystar Infinity
jogos.description: Binarystar Infinity is a 1-Bit Shoot ‘Em Up with a challenging experience reminding of the traditional Arcade Shmup classics, that can be experienced alone or with a friend, and with the particularity of being playable in vertical or horizontal scrolling mode.

jogos.title: Darwin Project
jogos.description: In Darwin Project, ten inmates must survive the elements, track each other, fight, craft tools, and use their social skills to be the last one standing. It_s a unique take on battle royale with a Show Director to influence the match and Spectator Interactions to create a one-of-a-kind game show.

jogos.title: Descent: Road to Legend
jogos.description: Road to Legend is a companion app for the Descent: Journeys in the Dark 2nd edition board game. When you play with Road to Legend, the app assumes the role of the overlord player, controlling monsters and inviting you to explore the dungeon in entirely new and unexpected ways.

jogos.title: StarCrossed
jogos.description: StarCrossed é um jogo de ação arcade com estética “magical girl” e um toque cooperativo. Junte-se ao grupo de 5 heroínas espaciais enquanto elas viajam entre planetas, trabalhando juntas para estreitar seus laços e derrotar o crescente mal que ameaça a galáxia.

jogos.title: Executive Assault
jogos.description: Executive Assault is an indie real-time strategy/first-person shooter where you can not only build your base and create armies, but also take control of your units and fight as one of them.

jogos.title: Deathmatch Classic
jogos.description: Aprecie partidas multijogadores em ritmo acelerado com Deathmatch Classic (também conhecido como DMC). Sendo o tributo da Valve ao trabalho da id software, DMC convida jogadores a pegar os seus lança-foguetes e testar os seus reflexos numa coleção de locais futurísticos.

jogos.title: Super Soccer Blast: America vs Europe
jogos.description: Prepare for the kick-off with a fast-paced football game, bringing a refreshing look to the football genre with accessible controls and skilled-based gameplay like over-the-top classic soccer games.

jogos.title: The Chaos Engine
jogos.description: Prepare-se para o mundo sombrio de The Chaos Engine, uma época Vitoriana de descoberta e tecnologia corrompida por uma experiência malsucedida com um computador arcaico: a máquina do caos. Escolha entre seis mercenários experientes, cada um com armas e habilidades exclusivas, para combater as monstruosidades grotescas criadas pela...

jogos.title: DERU - The Art of Cooperation
jogos.description: Deru é um jogo de enigmas cooperativo que combina arte abstrata e enigmas complexos para oferecer uma experiência de jogo única.

jogos.title: Straima
jogos.description: Straima is a devilishly difficult pulse-pumper platformer for 1-4 players. It includes several game modes, selectable powers and gameplay mutators, as well as a full feature level editor with Steam Workshop support so you can design and share your weird creations with chums for immense joy.

jogos.title: New Retro Arcade: Neon
jogos.description: Emulate your favorite arcade games in an environment engrossed with retro realism and extremely detailed surroundings. Be filled with nostalgia and realise what arcade life felt like back in the 80’s/early 90’s.

jogos.title: Fossil Hunters
jogos.description: A casual action-adventure game about digging for fossils and building your own dinosaurs.

jogos.title: ZERO GUNNER 2-
jogos.description: Go through the 360 degree siege! The top-down shooter to operate a attack helicopter. And with online rankings.

jogos.title: Last Resort
jogos.description: Last Resort is a small co-op shooter in which you and up to 3 others defend humanity_s first hotel on Mars against hostile aliens. Defend & power up generators, upgrade your weapons and gun down hordes of aliens to save the hotel!

jogos.title: Sam & Dan: Floaty Flatmates
jogos.description: Oh nooo, the world is flooded! Oh no, there is also a really big shark! You are a survivor of the apocalypse, stuck in your apartment, all by yourself, so sad... Across the street there is another survivor. Let_s wave to each other, work together and both reach the boat to get to safety!

jogos.title: TANKBOX
jogos.description: TANKBOX is a top-down perspective/orthographic arcade shooter. Fight it out against specialized AI-controlled tanks cooperatively with a friend or by yourself.

jogos.title: Gachi Dungeon Master
jogos.description: Take on the role of one of the five legendary gachimuchi icons and enter the arena. Each character is distinguished by their own grips and strikes. Someone falls with his ass right on the face of the opponent, and someone gracefully wringes the opponent_s hands.

jogos.title: I Am The Hero
jogos.description: I Am The Hero is a pixel art, beat 'em up, fighting game that tells the story of a "Hero" with a glorious but mysterious past. Is he the hero he thinks he is or is there a another side to this legendary figure?

jogos.title: VR Dungeon Knight
jogos.description: VR Dungeon Knight is a dungeon crawler with random level generation and Online Co-op. Explore, fight monsters, loot dungeons, level up, unlock classes and become the ultimate Dungeon Knight!

jogos.title: Frontlines™: Fuel of War™
jogos.description: Frontlines™: Fuel of War™ is an open-world First Person Shooter set on the frontlines of tomorrow. In a world ravaged by a global energy crisis, environmental decay, and economic depression, players assume the role of an elite soldier in the Western Coalition Army on an epic crusade against the Red Star Alliance to control the last of...

jogos.title: River City Ransom: Underground
jogos.description: Alex and Ryan must take to the streets to help a new crop of fighters. You'll earn money, unlock moves, and upgrade your skills in a sprawling city. This modern take on an old classic features over 500 unique street fighting moves, dozens of weapons, and fun online multiplayer modes.

jogos.title: Super Cable Boy
jogos.description: Super Cable Boy is a retro inspired platformer, where you are playing a living handheld gaming system with a power cord. Collect game cartridges to become more powerful and take on your quest to defeat "the Glitch", an entity that 1▧01☠01௹1‱☣∰0␢⌀▧ ..

jogos.title: Shield Impact
jogos.description: Shield Impact é um jogo de sobrevivência onde um gladiador com apenas um escudo será desafiado por hordas de inimigos em uma arena na Grécia antiga.

jogos.title: 5089: The Action RPG
jogos.description: 5089 is a deep & complex action RPG featuring strong sandbox roots. VR is supported, but not required. Watch the tutorial & VR videos next to the trailer! Everything is procedurally generated, like terrain, enemies, weapons, items & quests. Planet Xax_s war rages on... how is that possible?

jogos.title: Air Missions: HIND
jogos.description: Air Missions: HIND is an action combat flight simulator based on the Russian Mi-24 Hind assault helicopter. You will be deployed to the battlefield either on your own or with a friend.

jogos.title: BLUE WISH DESIRE
jogos.description: BLUW WISH DESIRE is 2D veritically scrolling shmup. Go through the barrage and destroy the oncoming enemies. In addition, this game is equipped with an auto guard system that automatically prevents mistakes. So even those who are not good at barrage STG are safe.

jogos.title: Scourge of War: Waterloo
jogos.description: Scourge of War: Waterloo follows in the footsteps of its American Civil War predecessors and takes the action to one of the most famous battles in history. It is by far the most detailed game about the final battle of the War of the Seventh Coalition.

jogos.title: Magic Twins
jogos.description: Magic Twins is a cooperative arcade puzzler game in which Abra and Cadabra must use their chromagic powers to defeat hordes of color elementals and stop the Colormageddon.

jogos.title: Space Farmers
jogos.description: Grab a friend, grab a gadget, grab a gun and get ready for the most fun you'll ever have in a co-op game!

jogos.title: Yargis - Space Melee
jogos.description: Yargis is a fast paced, top down spaceship shooter. Customize your ship to join a battle online or offline. Yargis is focused on team based, close combat action. The game has a variety of battle and co-op game modes and a powerful editor make Yargis a great game!

jogos.title: Last Will
jogos.description: Your deranged and mysterious Grandfather is dead, and in his last will and testament, he gave his entire fortune and mansion to you. But on one condition. You have to visit his mansion and collect the riches for yourself. But once the front door shuts behind you, you realize that this is no easy task...

jogos.title: 东方幻灵录 ~ Touhou Hakanai Cards
jogos.description: Touhou Hakanai Cards is an autochess-like leisure game, includes different styles and distinct characteristics roles, you can use these distinctive characters to organize your own team. Structure you battle economics and use the varied and graceful character cards to fight!

jogos.title: Angels Fall First
jogos.description: From commanding the battle standing on the bridge of your flagship all the way down to tactical infantry firefights - AFF brings together all the combat you ever wanted in a rich science fiction setting. Boarding, pilotable capital ships, deep weapon customization and full AI support included!

jogos.title: Climb Human
jogos.description: Entrem em cada cena, escalam constantemente para o ponto mais alto da cena, encontram comida para suplementar energia, e vão para a próxima cena.

jogos.title: The Narrator is a DICK : Longer, Harder, and Uncut
jogos.description: In this narrated unfair platformer there_s one man who_s always out to get you... The Narrator. He_s a real jerk, but with determination and a lot of skill MAYBE you can make it through this crazy adventure. Remastered with new Online Co-Op and Extended gameplay!

jogos.title: Satellite Reign
jogos.description: Satellite Reign is a real-time, class-based strategy game, set in an open-world cyberpunk city. You command a group of 4 agents through rain-soaked, neon-lit streets, where the law is the will of mega-corporations.

jogos.title: Super Soccer Blast: America vs Europe
jogos.description: Prepare for the kick-off with a fast-paced football game, bringing a refreshing look to the football genre with accessible controls and skilled-based gameplay like over-the-top classic soccer games.

jogos.title: RollerCoaster Tycoon World™
jogos.description: RollerCoaster Tycoon World™ é o novo lançamento da lendária franquia RCT. Este jogo de construção e simulação de parque temático de última geração inclui funcionalidades consagradas pelos fãs, assim como inovações incríveis!

jogos.title: Curses 'N Chaos
jogos.description: FIGHT OR DIE! Cursed by the evil Wizard King, bounty hunters Lea and Leo are chased by every monster in the kingdom and the Grim Reaper himself! There_s only one way to get rid of the curse; the legendary Elixir of Life! But how to get the ingredients? FIGHT MONSTERS!

jogos.title: Super Cyborg
jogos.description: Super Cyborg is an old school non-stop hardcore run'n'gun action game! You are an elite battle cyborg who is sent in to investigate a series of anomalies on a mysterious island. The merciless alien known as the 'Xirxul life form' has been awakened by unwitting scientists and now: all humanity is in danger!

jogos.title: Puzzle Pirates
jogos.description: Every activity in Puzzle Pirates is a uniquely fun puzzle: be it sailing, gunning, or hauling treasure, your own puzzling skill determines your success!

jogos.title: Crawlers and Brawlers
jogos.description: Become an adventurer and go on a fantastic journey through epic procedurally generated dungeons. Collect powerful loot to develop your character and then brawl online with your friends on 12 different multiplayer maps.

jogos.title: Drox Operative
jogos.description: Drox Operative is a starship action RPG with warring alien races, fierce space battles, a dynamic, evolving galaxy, and co-op multiplayer for Windows and Mac.Eons ago the Drox ruled the galaxy through their mighty Operatives. These elite starship captains were trained to accomplish the impossible at whatever cost necessary.

jogos.title: Train Simulator: Midland Main Line London-Bedford Route Add-On
Insanely Twisted Shadow Planet
jogos.description: In this Insanely Twisted, 2-D action-adventure game, explore unique environments and battle bizarre creatures.

jogos.title: FOOTBALLER
jogos.description: Plunge into the wonderful world of football together with millions of players from all over the world. Create and upgrade your character. Play online with friends in 1vs1, 2vs2, 3vs3, 4vs4 matches where every player is a real player. Find your comrades in our discord server and see you on the field!

jogos.title: Think of the Children
jogos.description: Little Bobby’s dead, the BBQ is on fire, Jen’s eating poisonous berries and the birthday cake still needs icing. It’s just another wonderful day out with the kids in Think of the Children, a frantic co-operative parenting simulator.

jogos.title: After Dark VR
jogos.description: After Dark VR is a VR online co-op survival horror where you play as either a Hunter on the hunt to strike down your next victim or as Survivors working together to stay alive and escape.

jogos.title: Warhammer: End Times - Vermintide Karak Azgaraz
Geometry Wars™ 3: Dimensions Evolved
jogos.description: Viva a evolução completa da premiada franquia Geometry Wars e batalhe contra ondas de inimigos em grades 3D nesse frenético jogo de tiro em estilo arcade!

jogos.title: DYO
jogos.description: DYO is a mind-bending cooperative platformer for one or two players where you can hop between two halves of a split screen.

jogos.title: Nation Red
jogos.description: Nation Red is an ultra fast infinite play arena-based shooter providing an exceptional close-quarter battlefield experience. Fight thousands of zombie mutants and their bosses in frantic bloody gameplay while earning close to 100 perks. Fight in Barricade, Survival or Free Play mode.

jogos.title: Guns n Zombies
jogos.description: O mundo depois de um apocalipse zumbi em que os personagens principais são forçados a sobreviver contra vários perigos. É uma história sobre pessoas normais forçadas ao perigo e que decidiram não fugir, mas lutar. Durante a história você descubrirá como foi o início do desastre e ajudará outros sobreviventes a superarem as consequências.

jogos.title: Galactic Lander
jogos.description: Inspired by the classic arcade Lunar Lander game, in Galactic Lander you control a delicate scientific spaceship which you must deliver from point A to point B, either alone, or with a friend in a co-op level, potentially made by the game_s own Steam Workshop community!

jogos.title: Sven Co-op
jogos.description: Sven Co-op is a co-operative game originally based around Valve Software_s Half-Life. In this game players must work together against computer controlled enemies and solve puzzles as a team.

jogos.title: Codename CURE
jogos.description: Codename CURE is a first person, co-operative zombie game with support for up to five players, providing dynamic, fast-paced zombie fragging with both objective, and survival-based missions.

jogos.title: Gatewalkers (Alpha)
jogos.description: O Gatewalkers é um jogo cooperativo de ação de sobrevivência com elementos de RPG, no qual você viaja por diferentes mundos para salvar o seu. Explore mundos gerados processualmente, enfrente seus hostis habitantes, enfrente desafios como condições climáticas extremas, atmosfera tóxica, falta de água e muito mais.

jogos.title: SUPER DRINK BROS.
jogos.description: Juice cans hit each other! ?? A powerful and high-speed 3D action game that decides the best drink in the world!

jogos.title: ZCREW（Z字特遣队）
jogos.description: ZCREW is an isometric shooter that supports up to 4 player co-op. In the world destroyed by an alien virus, you are an elite member of the U.N.R - an apocalyptic salvation organization. Work alone or in a team to fight for the future of mankind.

jogos.title: F.U.B.A.R
jogos.description: The World Is Pure F.U.B.A.R. Come together and fight with your friends against never ending waves of the undead.. or go solo and take on the treacherous horde alone.

jogos.title: Mugsters
jogos.description: Aliens have taken over the planet and enslaved humanity. Only you have the know-how to drive back the dastardly threat, free your fellow Earthlings and SAVE THE WORLD.

jogos.title: Final Exam Demo
jogos.description: Jump into the frenzied action and the whacky humor of a pure 2.5D side-scroller! While they were going to their old high school for what was supposed to be the party of their life, four long-time friends end up in a ghost town full of monstrous creatures.

jogos.title: Space Food Truck
jogos.description: Space Food Truck is a cooperative, culinary scifi adventure. 1-4 players take on unique roles aboard the Galaxy Gourmet. Their mission: explore a vast, procedurally-generated galaxy in search of exotic ingredients, craft delicious recipes, and withstand the untold dangers of deep space.

jogos.title: Lost Planet™: Extreme Condition
jogos.description: Driven to the brink of extinction on ice-covered wastelands, humankind fights to survive. Battle to survive against gargantuan alien Akrid and treacherous Snow Pirates on the vast and frozen landscape of EDN III.

jogos.title: PixelJunk™ Monsters Ultimate
jogos.description: Tikiman the Forest Defender is in trouble. Hordes of monsters are sweeping through his realm, hoping to chow down on his offspring – and it’s up to you to defend them. By placing weapon towers at strategic points around the landscape, you can destroy the invaders and save the little ones.

jogos.title: Nongunz: Doppelganger Edition
jogos.description: Nongunz é um jogo de ação em plataforma roguelite de geração procedural. Encare criaturas grotescas, mate rapidamente para encher o medidor de combo e resgate devotos para formar seu exército e comprar aprimoramentos.

jogos.title: Retro School
jogos.description: Retro School is a VHS PSX multiplayer horror game in which one crazed, unstoppable Teacher hunts down four kids through a terrifying nightmarish world in a deadly game of Cat & Mouse

jogos.title: Songbringer
jogos.description: Songbringer é um RPG de ficção científica com espadas, segredos, masmorras, chefes e muito mais.

jogos.title: Caçadores de Trolls: Defensores da Arcadia
jogos.description: Explore o universo dos Caçadores de Trolls e salve o mundo como Jim Lake Jr. nesse jogo repleto de ação!

jogos.title: Extreme Exorcism
jogos.description: Extreme Exorcism é um jogo de plataforma paranormal onde cada movimento seu voltará para assombrá-lo.

jogos.title: Volleyball Fever
jogos.description: Volleyball Fever is a VR sports game set on a tropical island. Stick your feet in the warm sand and join us on the beach! 🏐🌊🌴😃

jogos.title: BRAIN / OUT
jogos.description: Brain / Out is a multiplayer shooter with a nostalgic post-Soviet feel. Experience dynamic battles and exterminate your enemies with a large arsenal of modern weaponry. Lock'n'load!

jogos.title: Serious Sam 3: Jewel of the Nile
Of Guards And Thieves
jogos.description: Of Guards and Thieves é um jogo multiplayer com elementos de stealth aonde os poderosos guardas encontram rápidos e elusivos ladrões em uma luta de inteligência. Superar seu inimigo e fazer seu caminho para o objetivo são estratégias igualmente válidas.

jogos.title: Joint Operations: Combined Arms Gold
jogos.description: O mais feroz conflito online do século XXI agora está disponível em sua forma definitiva: introduzimos Joint Operations: Combined Arms Gold, a maior coleção de jogos multijogador de primeira pessoa. Com o premiado Joint Operations: Typhoon Rising e o bestseller Joint Operations: Escalation juntos em um conveniente pacote, está mais fácil...

jogos.title: Furious Seas
jogos.description: Furious Seas puts you in command as captain of a deadly pirate ship. Navigate through treacherous waters and blast apart fearsome enemy fleets in this thrilling VR adventure like no other. Carve out your legend today amidst the Furious Seas.

jogos.title: Crazy Pixel Streaker
jogos.description: A Fresh and Insane Brawler with Roguelike elements. Lead a fellowship of jackasses abducted by angry aliens and forced to spread chaos into the most famous sports events. Instant fun, Retro Arcade style, for up to 4 players.

jogos.title: Melon Simulator™
jogos.description: Melon Simulator™ is a chaotic, co-op (1 - 4 players), first person melee combat game. Almost anything that isn't nailed down can be used to whack, slice, and throw at the oncoming melon hoard...

jogos.title: Amoeba Battle: Microscopic RTS Action
jogos.description: Amoeba Battle é um novo tipo de jogo de estratégia em tempo real no qual irás controlar versáteis amebas em batalhas pela supremacia num mundo microscópico. Ao contrário dos jogos desse estilo, não precisas de construir bases - são criadas novas amebas através do milagre da fissão binária!

jogos.title: Jay and Silent Bob: Mall Brawl
jogos.description: Play as Jay and Silent Bob in a retro 8-bit sidescrolling brawler solo or with a friend. Pummel enemies with hard-hitting combos, dash attacks, and elbow drops as well as a random assortment of weapons as you battle your way out of the mall and back to the Quickstop.

jogos.title: Dead Alliance™
jogos.description: Dead Alliance™ é um jogo de tiro em ritmo rápido, de primeira pessoa, multijogador e de zumbis, cujo cenário é um mundo pós-apocalíptico, onde antigas bases militares foram transformadas nas únicas cidades-estados restantes.

jogos.title: spaceBOUND
jogos.description: spaceBOUND is a brutally challenging puzzle-platformer, set in a zero-gravity environment. Stranded and bound by their oxygen tether, two astronauts must work together to make it out alive. Go in alone, or team up and face the unknown.

jogos.title: Conflict: Denied Ops
jogos.description: *This is a single player only title*Venezuela is left in a state of civil war after the government was brutally overthrown by a military coup. With factions fighting to reinstate democracy, the U.S. government has offered their assistance, though the new government regime has threatened to deploy nuclear weapons if the U.S.

jogos.title: Commandos 3: Destination Berlin
jogos.description: Commandos 3: Destination Berlin is a game of real-time tactics that places you in command of an elite unit of Special Forces behind enemy lines in the European theater of World War II. From the shores of France to the heart of the Third Reich, strike fast from land or sea infiltrating hostile territories and conducting raids to disrupt...

jogos.title: Binary Domain
jogos.description: Set in futuristic Tokyo, take control of the robotic community before they control everything!

jogos.title: Shoot 1UP
jogos.description: Why play shoot 'em ups one ship at a time? Launch them all at once! Unleash an entire armada of ships in Shoot 1UP!

jogos.title: NECROSIS : RECONFIGURATED
jogos.description: NECROSIS : RECONFIGURATED is one Indie Arcade FPS Game That Brings The Player One Fast Paced Experience with huge variety of weapons to unlock!

jogos.title: Trident_s Wake
jogos.description: Trident_s Wake é um jogo de tiro de controle duplo e cooperativo, ambientado em um mundo de ficção científica severo. Junte-se a três outros jogadores para retomar a última esperança da humanidade, a nave-arca chamada Trident que caiu nas mãos de invasores alienígenas!

jogos.title: Abracadabrew
jogos.description: Abracadabrew é um jogo de memória com cooperativo local de 1 a 4 jogadores. Colabore com seus amigos enquanto usa suas habilidades de memória para fazer o máximo de poções que puder. Reúna ingredientes escondidos e comunique-se para desbloquear novas combinações de poções de rachar a cabeça!

jogos.title: My Free Zoo
jogos.description: A small zoo needs your help! As the new manager, it_s your job to boost business. Design the zoo of your dreams. From wolves and polar bears all the way to prehistoric beasts – the further you progress in the game, the more exotic the animals you'll be able to keep in your zoo. Play now and save the zoo!

jogos.title: Galactic Rangers VR
jogos.description: Galactic Rangers VR is a first-person space action VR game, deeply immersive, just as arcade shooter should be. Grab your pair of blasters and fight through endless waves of enemies for as long as you can!

jogos.title: Brick Breaker
jogos.description: Brick Breaker, the classic arcade game, is back with a breathtaking new version. Get ready for some seriously explosive gameplay filled with surprises. Collect bonuses, avoid traps and play your way to victory across all the levels. Play with up to 4 players in local mode.

jogos.title: holedown
jogos.description: A delightful spectacle of bouncing. Dig deep underground by shooting balls and breaking blocks, traversing your way to the planet cores.

jogos.title: There Will Be Ink
jogos.description: There Will Be Ink is a tactical action game for 1-8 players. Play solo or with friends in battles between stick figure armies on a paper notepad, just like you used to draw in class instead of paying attention!

jogos.title: Neighborhorde
jogos.description: Neighborhorde is a couch co-op shoot-em-up where you and your team of friends use toys as weapons and game-changing superpowers to try to survive the attacks of evil robots and zombie Abe Lincolns.

jogos.title: Codename: Terranova
jogos.description: Codename: Terranova is a Co-Op Communication Game between two Players: Agent (PC) and Operator (Web App) . Speed and precision are required to complete the Mission within the time limit and set a new record. Will you have the necessary concentration?

jogos.title: Kamikaze Veggies
jogos.description: Os vegetais vermelhos comunistas querem dominar o mundo! Apenas um esquadrão camicaze pode detê-los. Crie seu próprio time de vegeguerreiros, complete missões secretas e salve o mundo!

jogos.title: Dead Pixels
jogos.description: A toxic waste spill finds its way into the water supply, causing the recently deceased to rise from their graves. Now it_s up to you to blast your way through the hordes of undead if you're going to escape the city. On the way to your rescue, you'll search stores and houses for supplies, and trade with other survivors.

jogos.title: Monday Night Combat
jogos.description: Monday Night Combat is a class-based, third-person shooter… and the most popular lethal sport of the future!

jogos.title: Co-op SNEK Online
jogos.description: Coma pontos, fiquem longos, não morra. Aproveite a clássica jogada SNEK espalhada por muitas etapas com seus amigos tanto online quanto localmente.

jogos.title: Bunny Minesweeper
jogos.description: Multiplayer in Minesweeper? Yes! Play with your friends or random party in classic Minesweeper or try crazy challenging modes! Fun and hard simultaneously!

jogos.title: PixelJunk™ Nom Nom Galaxy
jogos.description: Welcome to SoupCo, Astroworker! In Nom Nom Galaxy, construct and automate gigantic soup factories on unexplored planets throughout the universe, harvest flora and fauna to turn them into artisanal soups, and rocket your product into the gullets of the galaxy!

jogos.title: Motor Strike: Racing Rampage
jogos.description: Bem-vindos à experiência de corrida mais insana e divertida que existe! Destrua seus amigos nesse jogo de corrida e tiro que é pura demência. Jogue sozinho, dividindo a tela ou on-line. Corra em diversas pistas, muitos veículos e artilharia pesada com múltiplos modos de jogo!

jogos.title: Kings and Pigs
jogos.description: Kings and Pigs - fun pixelated 2D platformer with the ability to play together.

jogos.title: Lazy Galaxy: Rebel Story
jogos.description: Start a Rebellion! Lead your ships to take down the evil O'Xelg base in this squad-based shoot-em-up!

jogos.title: TwinCop
jogos.description: O TwinCop é o jogo mais cooperativo, DE TODOS OS TEMPOS. Jogue este jogo de tiro cheio de ação, cooperativo, controlado por 2 controles com o seu melhor amigo ou parceiro. Você e o seu amigo são o TwinCop: Um jogador controla o braço direito; o outro controla o braço esquerdo; ambos controlam o movimento.

jogos.title: Astral Gunners
jogos.description: Get ready to push your skills to the limit against an endless sea of bullets and evil robots in Astral Gunners. Choose from five different gunners to master in this horizontal shooter. With the ability to dodge, reflect, delete, and convert bullets you are more powerful than you might believe.

jogos.title: World Soccer Strikers '91
jogos.description: WSS'91 chegou! Boas-vindas aos anos 1990! Ação e gráficos da época dos fliperamas! Junte seus amigos em sua sala de estar! Bastante times (pelo menos uns 70)! Modos de jogo como campeonatos, ligas e muito mais! O se pagamos metade de trocar a cada semana?

jogos.title: Bartlow_s Dread Machine
jogos.description: Um antigo artefato retorna em Bartlow_s Dread Machine, um jogo do início da era da eletricidade. Dread Machine é um arcade de tiro twin-stick com modos solo e cooperativo local, seis mundos cintilantes e um elenco de personagens e monstros improváveis.

jogos.title: Escape from Skull Dungeon
jogos.description: Your party finds themselves trapped in a Dungeon-themed Castle. Solve puzzles, crack riddles, dodge traps and discover hidden secrets in your adventure to Escape from Skull Dungeon!

jogos.title: RPG World - Action RPG Maker
jogos.description: RPG World – THE Action RPG Maker! Unleash your imagination with RPG World and create, share and play amazing 3D games with our growing community. Claim glory and treasure as you conquer magical worlds, alone or as a team. No coding required!

jogos.title: Catan VR
jogos.description: Catan VR allows tabletop fans and new players alike to experience the best-selling board game in a fresh, fully-immersive format. Take on other players around the world or play against Catan personalities and watch the island come to life in VR for the first time.

jogos.title: Warman
jogos.description: Warman is an action-adventure game. Explore and fight your way through handcrafted challenges on your own or with your friends. Each dungeon layout is unique!

jogos.title: Artemis Spaceship Bridge Simulator
jogos.description: Artemis is designed for anyone who watched Star Trek and dreamed of what it would be like to sit on the bridge of a star ship. Artemis simulates a spaceship bridge by networking several computers together. You cannot play Artemis single-player!

jogos.title: CAEDES
jogos.description: CAEDES is a CO-OP merciless physics-based VR shooter with tons of slow-mo, blood, and spent casings. Shoot and dual wield rifles, pistols, shotguns, and SMGs - unleash your inner Baba Yaga!

jogos.title: Hide and Shriek
jogos.description: Assuste e seja assustado nesse multijogador de Halloween cheio de malandragem! Prepare armadilhas, lance feitiços, e assuste a alma do seu adversário para vencer!

jogos.title: Tower Wars
jogos.description: Tower Wars combines elements of tower defense, RTS, and all-out multi-player mayhem to bring you a completely unique experience, delivered with a fun and funny not-so-old world style!

jogos.title: Shadow Puppeteer
jogos.description: Invite a friend to explore the strange, yet beautiful world of darkness and light in Shadow Puppeteer, an award-winning, local co-op adventure.

jogos.title: Pandemic Express - Zombie Escape
jogos.description: In Pandemic Express - Zombie Escape, a group of humans try to outrun a player-controlled swarm of infected. Everyone spawns in a train station until one is randomly infected and needs to turn fleeing survivors into zombies. Survivors try to escape by train.

jogos.title: The Last Archwing
jogos.description: The Last Archwing is a fast paced, vertically scrolling space shooter. Will you and your friends take up the mantle as Earth_s last defenders and thwart the plans of the evil Emperor Zarkhan?

jogos.title: Override 2: Super Mech League
jogos.description: O robô lutador gigante está mecanizando uma volta energizada em Override 2: Super Mech League! Enfrente a competição e suba o ranking para se tornar um piloto lendário.

jogos.title: Beat Me!
jogos.description: Beat Me! é um jogo multijogador baseado em física para até 6 jogadores. Jogue com personagens de fantasia cômicos em uma ampla variedade de ambientes divertidos e surpreendentes. Desafie seus amigos localmente ou derrote outros pela internet!

jogos.title: Space God
jogos.description: Space God is a 'hyper retro neon' style top-down shooting game. Play in single player, online co-op mode, or online multiplayer. Don't stop, keep moving! and you might survive... maybe.

jogos.title: Volleying
jogos.description: Tired of sports games in which the computer doesn’t respect your commands? As a physics-based game, Volleying gives the players more control over their moves, as well as delivers unique matches each round. Invite your friends over or play remotely and enjoy this predictably unpredictable experience!

jogos.title: Ball of Wonder
jogos.description: Come with us to the magnicifent world of circuses.

jogos.title: Lichtspeer: Double Speer Edition
jogos.description: LICHTSPEER é um simulador arcade de lanças de luz inspirado numa utopia germânica arcaica. Inclui modo cooperativo estrondoso para 2 jogadores! Sobrevive em grande estilo e reforça os teus poderes para combateres pela glória e pelo divertimento dos Deuses todo-poderosos.

jogos.title: Shadow Brawlers
jogos.description: O Shadow Brawlers é um jogo de festa local no qual os jogadores controlam ninjas bonitos e ágeis que se escondem nas sombras. Surpreenda seus oponentes aparecendo de repente do fundo; atacar e desaparecer.

jogos.title: RICO: London
jogos.description: RICO London é um jogo de tiro coop explosivo que manda ver e manda pra cadeia. Abra seu caminho no tiro até o topo de um arranha-céu lotado de bandidos do East End, na sua ou na parceria. Arrombe portas, desvie de balas e coloque as armas dos derrotados no seu arsenal.

jogos.title: Squeakers II
jogos.description: Water is flooding the world. Build your own way to climb higher and higher. Maybe there is a chance of survival after all. Give yourself a try! Help those boars reach the highest level.

jogos.title: Warlocks 2: God Slayers
jogos.description: Challenge the vile gods and dethrone them in this action RPG mixing retro aesthetics with modern gameplay. Team up with up to 4 friends in online & local co-op. Choose from a cast of 5 powerful Warlocks.

jogos.title: Trials of Wilderness
jogos.description: You are alone on an island, trying desperately to survive amongst the village tribes of savages. To do this you need food, water, and shelter. Hunt animals, plant crops, tame and breed animals, make weapons, armors and potions, raid villages, defend your base, fight with big creatures...

jogos.title: Cubic Castles
jogos.description: Your blocks, your castle, your world! Build anything you can dream up and explore with other players! Cubic Castles is a mini-MMO that combines the best of block-building and 3D platform action! Create fantastic parkour challenges, explore worlds made by other players, or even make friend!

jogos.title: ARMA: Gold Edition
jogos.description: ARMA: Gold is pack of ARMA: Armed Assault and an expansion pack ARMA: Queen_s Gambit. ARMA is a first person tactical military shooter with large elements of realism and simulation. This game features a blend of large-scale military conflict spread over large areas alongside the more closed quarters battle.

jogos.title: The Goatman
jogos.description: The Goatman is an Online CO-OP hunting game. It all began on February 23, 2019 with a call for help from the Greenfield village. It was alleged that a mysterious creature like a half goat and half demon attacked people and animals. Upon this call, a military research team set out.

jogos.title: Infected Shelter
jogos.description: Infected Shelter is an ultra-violent rogue-lite post-apocalyptic beat'em up. Singleplayer and co-op for up to four players.

jogos.title: The Captain is Dead
jogos.description: It’s the last 10 minutes of your favorite sci-fi TV show… except that this time things have gone seriously wrong and The Captain Is Dead! This turn-based, survival/strategy puts you in the Captain_s chair as you try to save your crew from being blown to bits by aliens...

jogos.title: Special Tactics
jogos.description: ST brings the most intense, tactical-action experience to Steam. Select your custom loadout, plan out strategies and accomplish your objectives. Addictive Survival mode and unrivaled multiplayer including Squads (1 vs 1, 2 vs 2, 2 vs 1)

jogos.title: Halo: Reach
jogos.developers: 343 Industries; Splash Damage; Ruffian Games; Bungie;

jogos.title: Eraser
jogos.description: Throw your stick-figure-self at cannonballs and airplanes in an upward pursuit of the eraser! Play cooperatively online to share the journey! Who_s to say whether the company will help or hinder, though...

jogos.title: Jelly Brawl
jogos.description: Jelly Brawl is a sticky and destructive multiplayer party game where you gotta jiggle, flop, and pop your way to the top! Fight alone or against friends with unique jelly based combat across tons of stages, mini games, and modes as you struggle to be the last jelly standing!

jogos.title: Masked Forces: Zombie Survival
jogos.description: What will you do when the zombie apocalypse comes, are you ready to tackle it right now and stay face to face with all the horrors that will appear?

jogos.title: Serious Sam Classic: The First Encounter
jogos.description: Serious Sam is a high-adrenaline single-play and 16-player co-operative arcade-action FPS and Gamespot_s Game of the Year 2001!

jogos.title: The Expendabros
jogos.description: The Expendabros have assembled and set their sights on the forces of ruthless arms dealer Conrad Stonebanks in the forests of Eastern Europe. Battle in a flurry of bullets and non-stop action through ten full-throttle missions set amongst the picturesque tree tops and the absurdly dangerous lumber mills teeming with enemy soldiers,...

jogos.title: Othello Let_s Go
jogos.description: Othello Let_s Go is a beautifully designed strategy board game for all ages. A total of 8 levels of computer AI difficulty, suits for both beginners and experts! More than 100 carefully selected Endgame and Lights Out levels are waiting for you to solve!

jogos.title: Takedown: Red Sabre
jogos.description: TAKEDOWN é um atirador para estrategas. O jogador que tiver calma, fizer pontaria com cuidado e planear corretamente os seus movimentos irá suplantar o jogador que se limita a correr e disparar para todo o lado.

jogos.title: Rogue Party 2
jogos.description: Explore dungeons, defeat bosses and earn epic rewards with up to three other friends (and occasionally hit them with potions) in this playful Rogue-Like adventure.

jogos.title: Dark Prospect
jogos.description: Dark Prospect is a 4vs1 asymmetrical FPSvsRTS multiplayer game where 4 FPS players must survive by collecting resources, building defenses and fighting against a player who summons and commands monsters from an RTS perspective.

jogos.title: Pixel Worlds: MMO Sandbox
jogos.description: Award winning indie game studio Kukouri welcomes you to our multiplatform MMO sandbox: Pixel Worlds! (” Best Indie Game Developer ” Global Mobile Game Awards 2019) Play free with friends, create your own worlds and stories. Fight off the enemies and get awesome items in this award winning indie MMO!

jogos.title: RevolVR 3
jogos.description: RevolVR 3 é um jogo de tiro casual para um ou múltiplos jogadores situado em uma versão robótica do Velho Oeste. Socialize com amigos no salão, jogue minigames e participe de partidas rápidas de mata-mata contra outras pessoas ou robôs!

jogos.title: 除灵派对 EA/GhostHunter EA
jogos.description: Ghost Hunter is a cartoon style party game. You can play it with your local and online friends. Use your SpiritGun to eliminate ghost and disturb your adversary.

jogos.title: Saints Row IV: Inauguration Station
jogos.description: Upload characters created or modified in the "Inauguration Station" to play with them in Saints Row IV. Tip: You can download your Saints Row: The Third characters to update them for Saints Row IV. Browse an online gallery to view thousands of shared community characters.

jogos.title: Come with Me
jogos.description: Come with Me is a two-player cooperative game set in a puzzle filled magical world. Solve puzzles together by using your special abilities and collect memories to uncover the mystery of the world around you.

jogos.title: MEMORIES OF MARS
jogos.description: Survive the extreme conditions on Mars. Compete or cooperate with others to gather resources, 3D print your equipment and build your base, unveil the story behind the abandoned mining operations and, ultimately, escape the Red Planet.

jogos.title: Solar Purge
jogos.description: Blow away everything in your path in this 4 player co-op, sci-fi, arcade-action RPG twin-stick shooter! Explore huge worlds, level up your characters, defeat giant bosses and discover the mystery of Nova Genesis!

jogos.title: Dino D-Day
jogos.description: Frantic, multiplayer action involving Nazis and dinosaurs! What are you waiting for? This is World War II as it should have been!

jogos.title: Lurk in the Dark : Prologue
jogos.description: A town flourished with woodworking and mining, "Babel_s Hill Top". A Ruggles family who contributed greatly to the development of this town several centuries ago. The tragedy that happened at the residence of them. In this residence where blood and hatred are ingrained, their nightmare begins.

jogos.title: JUMANJI: The Video Game
jogos.description: Uma união de aventura, riso e muita ação em Jumanji, o maior desafio em equipe para aqueles que querem deixar seu mundo para trás.

jogos.title: Hide and Seek
jogos.description: It is a very funny, fast and easy game which can be played by adults as well as children. This game has two teams that try to prevent each other from winning.

jogos.title: Fade to Silence
jogos.description: Fade to Silence is a single-player and co-op survival adventure set in a post-apocalyptic world that is frozen in an eternal winter. Snow and ice have shaped a merciless landscape. Nature is corrupted. Monstrous creatures out of an Eldritch horror dream roam the frozen wasteland.

jogos.title: Blind Trust
jogos.description: Blind Trust is a two-player, cooperative game where the deaf leads the blind on a fantasy island. Navigate using only 3D sound as the blind Oracle, or lead the Oracle with magical sound beacons as the deaf Soldier. Work together to fight monsters, solve puzzles, and reach your ultimate goal.
jogos.developers: Viswanath Atlu; Laurie Banks; Rohan Bhukan; Nick Burnham; Avinash Kalapala; Yash Kapani; Katharine Marsh; Ankur Rathore; Hardit Singh; Anoop Nihar Srinivas; Ryan Guanyuhao Jiang; Robert Zhu;

jogos.title: Stellar Survivor
jogos.description: Stranded on an alien planet, you must defend your Powercore! Use your weapons to fight hordes of alien enemies and strategically use traps in this new FPS tower-defense survival game!

jogos.title: Derpy Conga
jogos.description: Um jogo de plataforma baseado em física e que fala sobre a importância da amizade! Reúna seus amigos e forme uma fila de conga mas cuidado: quanto mais longa, mais difícil de controlá-la! Mas como uma mão lava a outra (haha!), com muitos amigos ao seu lado, fica mais fácil superar os obstáculos.

jogos.title: Escape from Kyoto House
jogos.description: Your party finds themselves trapped in a Japanese-themed room. Solve puzzles, crack riddles and discover hidden secrets in your adventure to Escape from Kyoto House!

jogos.title: Zero-based World-从零开始
jogos.description: Zero Based World is a multiplayer sandbox survival game.

jogos.title: Fighties
jogos.description: Fighties is a fast paced 2D platform fighter. Choose from a wide selection of Fighties each with their own unique play style. Beat down your opponents to become the strongest Fightie of them all.

jogos.title: The Last One Month
jogos.description: The Last One Month is a unique mix of Battle Royale, Survival RPG and Turn-based Strategy games where you become one of 50 warriors and battle each other to become the hero who will save the kingdom.

jogos.title: Rugby Challenge 4
jogos.description: READY FOR THE CROSS KICK?

jogos.title: Descent
jogos.description: Prepare To Start Your Descent.Sensory overload in 360° 3-D.Welcome to Descent™ - 27 levels of the most mind-bending, stomach-churning action game ever. Featuring true 3-Dimensional worlds with light source shading, texture mapping, 3-D morphing, directional sound effects and sizzling music, this is technology taken to the limit.

jogos.title: Helios
jogos.description: Helios is a social VR and Desktop framework for you to create your dream worlds and avatars.

jogos.title: Ephesus
jogos.description: Ephesus is an exploration and survival game adorned with a unique story. Write your own destiny through the West Aegean Coast of the glorious Roman Empire. While you're on the path, don't forget to stay alive!

jogos.title: Nether Nightmare
jogos.description: In Nether Nightmare you will be immersed in the void. Each cycle, each step taken will lead you to ...

jogos.title: Good Knight
jogos.description: You run around in circles and start yelling like an idiot due to rage, fun, BUTTCLENCH, and triumph in this rhythm game-influenced game. One-Button Rage-Puzzle Hell made for everyone! Journey to hell in this dark love letter to Filipino horror, culture, and history. It_s also the PHVTUBERS fav game!

jogos.title: Brendan Keogh_s Putting Challenge
jogos.description: Brendan Keogh’s Putting Challenge is a local co-op golf game about all the parts other golf videogames cut out. Sounds tedious? It sort of is. Bring your friends!

jogos.title: Not Dead Yet
jogos.description: Not Dead Yet é um jogo de tiro rápido que combina estratégia, elementos de 'deck-building' e mecânicas motoras. Monte um personagem único, compre equipamentos melhores, aprenda o inimigo e fuja deste inferno pós-apocalíptico cheio de zumbis bizarros. Jogue sozinho ou com até 3 amigos.

jogos.title: Spellsworn
jogos.description: Enter a world of magic and battle, where your wits and reflexes will be pushed to their limits! Choose your spells, enter the ever-changing arena and prepare to obliterate all who stand in your way!

jogos.title: Comando 8-bits
jogos.description: 8-bit Commando é um jogo de plataforma, rápido com ação, trilha sonora impressionante (feita dos chiptunes do artista Ozzed), multijogador local e explosões.

jogos.title: Flash Point: Fire Rescue
jogos.description: Coordinate a squad of firefighters as they navigate the hazards of a structural fire in search of the survivors trapped inside. Flash Point: Fire Rescue is a turn-based strategy port of the acclaimed board game. A unique tactical firefighting experience to enjoy with your family and friends.

jogos.title: Super Club Soccer
jogos.description: Super Club Soccer is a tactical turn based football game. Create your player and begin competing in tactical online battles against users from around the globe, or hone your skills against our AI in single player action. Start your soccer story today!

jogos.title: Hoplegs
jogos.description: Hoplegs é um jogo de plataforma divertido e diferente onde os botões do controle são suas pernas! Crie e compartilhe suas próprias fases, desafie seus amigos e divirta-se!

jogos.title: Jet Set Knights
jogos.description: Jet Set Knights is an old-school arcade action platformer inspired by classics from the golden age such as Mario Bros, Snow Bros or newest Super Crate Box. If You love retro 2D platformers mixed with tower defense and RPG elements, Jet Set Knight is for You!

jogos.title: Tyrannis
jogos.description: Tyrannis is an asymmetric, turn-based strategy game that pits overstretched armies of mercenaries against small rebel groups across an authoritarian dystopia. Those who make peaceful revolution impossible will make violent revolution inevitable. Which will you choose?

jogos.title: Santa Claws
jogos.description: Ele vê você quando você está dormindo. Ele sabe quando você está acordado. Ele sabe se você foi ruim ou bom. Então seja bom ... pelo amor de Deus ... Garras do Papai Noel está chegando à cidade.

jogos.title: Couch Monsters
jogos.description: Monstros fofinhos com portais dentro da boca! Couch Monsters é um jogo cooperativo local onde dois monstrinhos adoráveis precisam solucionar puzzles baseados em física para chegar aos confortáveis sofás. Tudo que um monstro comer, o outro irá cuspir!

jogos.title: Superstar Racing
jogos.description: Superstar Racing is a popular arcade-style MMO racing game. Superstar Racing Features – Invite other players and create your own Racing Team! – Create your own personal driver and take it to the track. – Race with players around the world and become your own racing superstar!

jogos.title: Survival Vacancy
jogos.description: Em um apocalipse nuclear, precisa de usar suas capacidades de engenharia para salvar o maior número possível de sobreviventes. O seu objetivo é defender, minar, construir, automatizar e construir uma cidade subterrânea para os sobreviventes.

jogos.title: Save Your Nuts
jogos.description: Save Your Nuts é um jogo multiplayer maluco com animais da floresta. Coloque suas habilidades de cooperação à prova em batalhas intensas e competitivas. Junte seus amigos ou jogue online com até 8 jogadores!
